唉，真可惜！
Ai，zhēn kěxī！
What a pity!
爱惜人才
àixī réncái 
treasure men of talent
爱惜时间
àixī shíjiān 
make the best use of one\'s time; use time efficiently
不能不表示惋惜
bùnéng bùbiǎoshì wǎnxī 
cannot but express regret
不惜一切代价
bùxī yíqiè dàijià 
at all costs; at any cost
这部书很好，可惜残了。
Zhèbù shū hěn hǎo，kěxī cán le。
It is a very good book, but unfortunately it\'s incomplete.
依依惜别的场景
yīyīxībié de chǎngjǐng 
sentimental parting scene
不惜任何代价
bùxī rènhé dàijià 
prepared to pay any price; at any cost; at all costs
这样珍贵的资料竟被废置在一边，真是太可惜了。
Zhèyàng zhēnguì de zīliào jìng bèi fèizhì zài yìbiān，zhēnshì tài kěxī le。
It\'s a great pity such precious documents should be cast aside as useless.
顾惜自己的身体
gùxī zìjǐ de shēntǐ
look after one\'s health
可惜我去晚了一步，最精彩的节目已经演过了。
Kěxī wǒ qùwǎn le yíbù，zuì jīngcǎi de jiémù yǐjing yǎngu le。
What a pity I was just too late for the best item on the programme.
决不怜惜恶人。
Jué bùliánxī èrén。
We should never take pity on evil people.
不吝惜自己的力量
bú lìnxī zìjǐ de lìliang
spare no effort; stint no effort
不吝惜钱财
bú lìnxī qiáncái 
spare no expense
两人依依惜别，难舍难分。
Liǎngrén yīyīxībié，nánshěnánfēn。
The two of them could hardly tear themselves away from each other.
可惜的是把这么多时间全浪费了。
Kěxī de shì bǎ zhèmeduō shíjiān quán làngfèi le。
It\'s a pity we\'ve wasted so much of our time.
可惜他所学非所用。
Kěxī tā suǒ xué fēi suǒ yòng。
Pity he\'s employed in a job not in his line.
我们都为失去一个好同志而感到痛惜。
Wǒmen dōu wèi shīqù yígè hǎo tóngzhì ér gǎndào tòngxī。
We all deeply regretted the loss of such a good comrade.
我把旧书全卖了，一直感到惋惜。
Wǒ bǎ jiùshū quán mài le，yìzhí gǎndào wǎnxī。
I\'ve always regretted selling all my old books.
我对她不幸的遭遇非常同情，可惜无能为力。
Wǒ duì tā búxìng de zāoyù fēichángtóngqíng，kěxī wúnéngwéilì。
I sympathize with her in her misfortune, but I\'m afraid I can do nothing to help.
惜寸阴
xī cùnyīn 
value every bit of time; make good use of every moment
依依惜别
yīyīxībié 
be reluctant to part
老师们怀着惜别的心情，送走了毕业同学。
Lǎoshīmen huái zhe xībié de xīnqíng，sòngzǒu le bìyè tóngxué。
The teachers reluctantly parted with the graduates.
小张干活从不惜力。
Xiǎo Zhānggànhuó cóngbùxīlì。
Xiao Zhang never spares himself in his work.
他根本没有惜怜体贴女人的习惯。
Tā gēnběn méiyǒu xīlián tǐtiē nǚrén de xíguàn。
He is not used to showing consideration for women.
那些了不得的作家，谨严入骨，惜墨如金，要把一生的作品，只删存一个或者三四个字。
Nàxiē liǎobu de de zuòjiā，jǐnyánrùgǔ，xīmòrújīn，yào bǎ yìshēng de zuòpǐn，zhǐ shān cún yígè huòzhě sān sì gè zì。
Some important writers are so strict with themselves, so sparing of ink, that they like to pare down the work of a lifetime to three or four words.
在此依依惜别的时刻
zài cǐ yīyīxībié de shíkè 
at this moment when we reluctantly bid farewell to each other
珍惜时间
zhēnxī shíjiān 
value one\'s time
珍惜人才
zhēnxī réncái 
value people of ability
吝惜
lìnxī
grudge; stint
惋惜
wǎnxī
feel sorry for sb. or about sth.; regret
珍惜
zhēnxī
treasure; value; cherish
她总是一幅哀苦的样子，让人怜惜。
Tā zǒngshì yìfú āikǔ de yàngzi，ràng rén liánxī。
She always looks sad, which makes people feel sorry for her.
他爱惜羽毛、洁身自好，令人钦佩。
Tā àixī yǔmáo、jiéshēn zìhào，lìngrén qīnpèi。
He takes great care not to do anything that may compromise his good name. That\'s great.
为了名利，他不惜毁身拜誉。
Wèile mínglì，tā bùxī huǐshēn bàiyù。
To get that honor, he ruined his own reputation.
我也曾厕足于多个领域，可惜学业不精。
Wǒ yě céng cèzú yú duō gè lǐngyù，kěxī xuéyè bùjīng。
I have set foot in many fields, but have no particular expertise.
他长别人世，使人悲痛惋惜。
Tā chángbié rénshì，shǐ rén bēitòng wǎnxī。
His departure left people grief-stricken.
这本词话现在已经失传了，真是可惜。
Zhèběn cíhuà xiànzài yǐjing shīchuán le，zhēnshì kěxī。
It is a pity that this novel has been lost to the world.
爷爷送给我一本词谱，我非常爱惜。
Yéye sònggěi wǒ yìběn cípǔ，wǒ fēicháng àixī。
Grandpa gave me a collection of tunes of ci poems and I treasure it very much.
妈妈给我买了个新瓷缸，我很爱惜。
Māma gěi wǒ mǎi le gè xīn cígāng，wǒ hěnàixī。
Mother bought me a new porcelain jar which I treasure very much.
机会得而复失，人们都很惋惜。
Jīhuì déérfùshī，rénmen dōu hěnwǎnxī。
People felt regret for the chance that was lost after being gained.
这些耕地丢荒了，真让人可惜。
Zhèxiē gēngdì diūhuāng le，zhēn ràngrén kěxī。
It is a pity to let this cultivated land lie idle.
我想吃清炒豆苗，可惜自己不会做。
Wǒ xiǎng chī qīng chǎo dòumiáo，kěxī zìjǐ bú huì zuò。
I want to eat stir-fried bean seedlings, but I can\'t make the dish myself.
这鼎真精美，只可惜耳子有些破损了。
Zhè dǐng zhēn jīngměi，zhī kěxī ěrzi yǒuxiē pòsǔn le。
The tripod cauldron is exquisite, it\'s a pity the ears have been damaged.
手头的这几件事都要处理，可惜分身乏术。
Shǒutóu de zhèjǐjiàn shì dōuyào chǔlǐ，kěxī fēnshēn fáshù。
I am incapable of dealing with so many matters simultaneously.
为获高利，他们不惜以次充好。
Wèi huò gāolì，tāmen bùxī yǐ cì chōnghǎo。
To obtain higher profit, they have no hesitation in replacing superior quality products with shoddy products.
文革中下乡的艺术家到现在还有很多都没有归口，真是可惜。
Wéngé zhōng xiàxiāng de yìshùjiā dào xiànzài háiyǒu hěnduō dōu méiyǒu guīkǒu，zhēnshì kěxī。
It is pity that many of the old artists that went to the countryside during the Cultural Revolution haven\'t been able to return to their original professions yet.
时光如流水，忽忽而过，所以我们要珍惜时间。
Shíguāng rú liúshuǐ，hūhū ér guò，suǒyǐ wǒmen yào zhēnxī shíjiān。
Time is like water flowing away quickly, we must cherish it.
我爱我生命中的晦暝时刻，虽然灰暗但是可以让我更珍惜阳光。
Wǒ ài wǒ shēngmìng zhōng de huìmíng shíkè，suīrán huīàn dànshì kěyǐ ràng wǒ gèng zhēnxī yángguāng。
I love those depressing times in my life. Although dark, they made me cherish the sunshine more.
这只母鸡肚子里面已经有鸡子儿了，杀了可惜。
Zhèzhī mǔjī dùzi lǐmian yǐjing yǒu jīzir le，shā le kěxī。
This hen has already got some eggs in her stomach, so it would be a pity to kill her.
这种珍稀生物已无噍类了，真是可惜啊。
Zhèzhǒng zhēnxī shēngwù yǐ wú jiàolèi le，zhēnshì kěxī a。
What a pity that this kind of rare animal has become extinct.
这次的报告会，主题是好的，只可惜内容空乏。
Zhècì de bàogàohuì，zhǔtí shì hǎo de，zhǐ kěxī nèiróng kōngfá。
This speech had a good topic but was empty of content.
他是个旷代奇才，可惜生不逢时。
Tā shì gè kuàngdài qícái，kěxī shēng bùféngshí。
He was an unrivalled talent, but unfortunately at the wrong time.
你这门手艺，因为没有用武之地而旷废了，真可惜！
Nǐ zhè mén shǒuyì，yīnwèi méiyǒu yòngwǔ zhī dì ér kuàngfèi le，zhēn kěxī！
It is regrettable that your skill was neglected because it can be applied nowhere.
他从教师的岗位上离去，大家都觉得可惜。
Tā cóng jiàoshī de gǎngwèi shàng líqù，dàjiā dōu juédé kěxī。
Everyone thought it was a pity that he left his job as a teacher.
他为了这个职位不惜卖友求荣。
Tā wèi le zhège zhíwèi bùxī màiyǒu qiúróng。
He did not hesitate to betray his friend to obtain the position.
离别时刻他们俩难分难舍，又说了好多惜别的话。
Líbié shíkè tāmenliǎ nánfēn nánshě，yòu shuō le hǎo duō xībié de huà。
At the time to bid farewell, the two could hardly tear themselves apart from each other, and kept talking.
小明从小就脑瓜儿聪明，可惜就是不喜欢学习。
Xiǎo Míng cóng xiǎo jiù nǎoguār cōngmíng，kěxī jiùshì bùxǐhuan xuéxí。
Xiaoming has been clever since he was young, but he doesn’t like studying.
为了掩盖自己的罪行，他不惜杀人灭口。
Wèile yǎngài zìjǐ de zuìxíng，tā bùxī shārénmièkǒu。
He didn\'t hesitate to kill the witness to cover up the crime.
为了能够擅权，他不惜使用各种卑劣手段。
Wèile nénggòu shànquán，tā bùxī shǐyòng gèzhǒng bēiliè shǒuduàn。
In order to monopolize power, he does not hesitate to use every mean trick.
为了追求真理，他不惜舍身求法。
Wèile zhuīqiú zhēnlǐ，tā bùxī shěshēn qiú fǎ。
He is willing to sacrifice himself for his pursuit of truth.
帝王不惜劳民伤财地为自己建造生圹。
Dìwáng bùxī láomín shāngcái de wèi zìjǐ jiànzào shēngkuàng。
Emperors spared no efforts in constructing tombs for themselves while they were still alive.
这笔生意最终没有谈成，真令人叹惜。
Zhèbǐ shēngyì zuì zhōng méiyǒu tánchéng，zhēn lìngrén tànxī。
It is a great pity that the transaction is lost.
这位将军非常体惜士兵，得到了士兵们的拥戴。
Zhèwèi jiāngjūn fēicháng tǐxī shìbīng，dédào le shìbīngmen de yōngdài。
The general shows great understanding and sympathy for his soldiers, which is why all the soldiers love and respect him.
这一带田畴都毁于洪水了，真让人惋惜呀。
Zhè yídài tiánchóu dōu huǐ yú hóngshuǐ le，zhēn ràng rén wǎnxī ya。
All the fields here have been destroyed by floods, which is a real pity.
他一直想去五岭看一看，只可惜没时间。
Tā yìzhí xiǎng qù wǔlǐng kànyikàn，zhǐ kěxī méi shíjiān。
He has always wanted to visit the Five Ridges, but never had the time.
四场比赛后甲队以一分之差惜败。
Sì chǎng bǐsài hòu jiǎduì yǐ yìfēn zhī chā xībài。
After four games, the first team lost by only one point.
部分商人囤积惜售造成物价飞涨。
Bùfen shāngrén túnjī xīshòu zàochéng wùjià fēizhǎng。
Some of the businessmen\'s over stocking of goods, and reluctance to sell caused an increase in prices.
多年惜阴苦读，他终于考取了功名。
Duōnián xīyīn kǔdú，tā zhōng yú kǎoqǔ le gōngmíng。
After many years of hard work, he finally succeeded in the imperial exam and won fame and honor.
小王是个懂得惜玉怜香的人，把女朋友照顾得很好。
Xiǎo Wáng shì gè dǒngdé xīyù liánxiāng de rén，bǎ nǚpéngyou zhàogù de hěn hǎo。
Xiao Wang is a considerate man, and takes good care of his girlfriend.
这里以前是个繁华的闹市，只可惜现在草木萧疏。
Zhèlǐ yǐqián shì gè fánhuá de nàoshì，zhī kěxī xiànzài cǎomù xiāoshū。
This place used to be a crowed market, but it is deserted now.
我很想帮你，可惜我心余力绌。
Wǒ hěn xiǎng bāng nǐ，kěxī wǒ xīnyú lìchù。
I really want to help you, but I don\'t have the ability to do so.
他们彼此趣味相投，惺惺惜惺惺。
Tāmen bǐcǐ qùwèi xiāngtóu，xīngxīng xī xīngxīng。
They have similar interests and tastes, and therefore appreciate each other.
妈妈买回好多杏子，可惜大部分是酸的。
Māma mǎihuí hǎoduō xìngzǐ，kěxī dàbùfen shì suān de。
Mother bought many apricots, but most of them were sour.
卖花的女孩沿街叫卖，可惜没有人买她的花。
Màihuā de nǚhái yánjiē jiàomài，kěxī méiyǒu rén mǎi tā de huā。
The flower girl sold alongside the road, but no one bought her flowers.
可惜我们公司没有像你这样摇鹅毛扇的。
Kěxī wǒmen gōngsī méiyǒu xiàng nǐ zhèyàng yáo émáoshàn de。
It\'s really a pity that our company hasn\'t anyone that can mastermind a complicated operation like you.
她冶容凄惨，令人怜惜。
Tā yěróng qīcǎn，lìngrén liánxī。
She has a bewitching appearance which arouses people\'s tender affections.
大学毕业了，同学们依依惜别，不知何时再相聚。
Dàxué bìyè le，tóngxuémen yīyī xībié，bùzhī héshí zài xiāngjù。
When we graduated from the university, we said goodbye reluctantly to each other without knowing when we would get together again.
为了让小刚读书，爷爷不惜借印子为他交学费。
Wèile ràng Xiǎo Gāng dúshū，yéye bùxī jièyìnzi wèi tā jiāo xuéfèi。
In order to pay Xiaogang\'s tution fee, grandpa borrowed money from a usurer.
黄金有价，真情无价，所以我们要珍惜友情。
Huángjīn yǒujià，zhēnqíng wújià，suǒyǐ wǒmen yào zhēnxī yǒuqíng。
Gold has a certain price, but true love is invaluable; therefore we should treasure friendship.
他这首诗原为你所作，可惜你不喜欢。
Tā zhèshǒushī yuán wèi nǐ suǒzuò，kěxī nǐ bùxǐhuan。
He wrote this poem for you. What a pity that you don\'t like it.
远离战争一直是她的愿望，只可惜很难如愿。
Yuǎnlí zhànzhēng yìzhí shì tā de yuànwàng，zhī kěxī hěn nán rúyuàn。
Escaping from the war has always been her wish. Unfortunately, it wil be hard to realize.
对于他的英年早逝我们都感到十分惋惜。
Duìyú tā de yīngnián zǎoshì wǒmen dōu gǎndào shífēn wǎnxī。
We are very sorry about his early death.
纸上写着的是音素文字吧，可惜我看不懂。
Zhǐ shàng xiě zhe de shì yīnsù wénzì ba，kěxī wǒ kàn bùdǒng。
What is written on the paper is in a phonemic language, it\'s a pity I can\'t read it.
爱惜时间
àixī shíjiān 
value one\'s time
这是匹好马，可惜残了。
Zhè shìpǐ hǎomǎ，kěxī cán le。
This is a good horse. It\'s a shame it\'s lame.
错过了那个工作机会，真可惜！
Cuòguòle nàgè gōngzuò jīhuì，zhēn kěxī！
What a shame you missed out on that job opportunity!
可惜我不能参加你们的婚礼了。
Kěxī wǒ bùnéng cānjiā nǐmen de hūnlǐ le.
Unfortunately, I can\'t attend your wedding.
教练为队员受伤感到惋惜。
Jiàoliàn wèi duìyuán shòushāng gǎndào wǎnxī。
The coach regretted the injury to the team member.
惜时如命
xī shí rú mìng
regard one\'s time as precious

wǎnxī

lìnxī
stint

bùxī yíqiè dàijià

他工作时从不惜力。
Tā gōngzuò shí cóngbù xīlì。
He always gives his all at work.
年轻人要珍惜生活，不要游戏人生。
Niánqīngrén yào zhēnxī shēnghuó，búyào yóuxì rénshēng。
Young people must cherish life and mustn\'t play at it.

太可惜了！足球击中球门柱弹了出去。
tài kě xī le！zú qiú jī zhòng qiú mén zhù tán le chū qù。
What a great pity! The ball bounced off the goalpost.

这么肥沃的地，撂荒太可惜了。
岂不可惜？
中途弃学，十分可惜。
他英年早逝，令人叹惜。
体惜部下
体惜儿女。
这场比赛我队仅以1分之差惜败。
由于部分企业惜售炒作，致使棉花供应趋紧

奶奶最疼惜小孙女。

他惜墨如金，篇篇都是精品。

What a pity, all the fruit has gone bad.
真可惜，所有的水果都坏了。
I will spare no money in finding my dog.
我将不惜重金寻找爱犬。
She is such a power-hungry politician that does anything to achieve success.
她是一名对权利充满渴望的政客，为了成功，会不惜一切代价。
It\'s a lovely shot - just a pity it isn\'t a bit better centred.
照得很好，可惜有点偏了。

what a waste!
真可惜！
If the security of my country is at stake I will give my life to protect it.
如果国家的安全受到威胁，我会不惜付出生命来保护它。
They want to villainize law enforcement at any cost.
他们想不惜任何代价，使执法系统变质。
I regret the loss of life in this earthquake.
我为这次地震中死去的人感到痛惜。
We deeply regret that this huge fire took away two young men\'s lives.
这次大火夺走了两个年轻人的生命，我们为此感到深深的惋惜。
Our leaders will protect our territories at all costs.
Wǒmen de lǐngdǎorén jiāng bùxī yíqièdàijià bǎowèi wǒmen de lǐngtǔ wánzhěng。
我们的领导人将不惜一切代价保卫我们的领土完整。
He always showed so much affection towards me; something I cherish greatly.
Tā yìzhí biǎoxiànchū duì wǒ de nóngnóng àiyì；zhè shì wǒ jíwéi zhēnxī de dōngxi。
他一直表现出对我的浓浓爱意；这是我极为珍惜的东西。
He appreciates handmade Italian suits.
Tā zhēnxī shǒugōng zhì de Yìdàlì xīzhuāng。
他珍惜手工制的意大利西装。
I feel sorry for kids that are in showbusiness from a really young age.
Wǒ wèi nàxiē zài hěnxiǎo niánlíng jiù cóngshì yǎnyì de háizǐmen gǎndào wǎnxī。
我为那些在很小年龄就从事演艺的孩子们感到惋惜。
The lord treasured his right to hunt in his forests .
Zhège jūnzhǔ zhēnxī zài tā zìjǐ de cónglín lǐ dǎliè de quánlì。
这个君主珍惜在他自己的丛林里打猎的权利。
I wanted to succeed at any price.
Wǒ xiǎng chénggōng，bùxī rènhé dàijià。
我想成功，不惜任何代价。
Should people pursue their own happiness at the expense of others?
Nándào rénmen yīnggāi wèile zhuīqiú zìjǐ de xìngfú ér bùxī sǔnhài tārén ma？
难道人们应该为了追求自己的幸福而不惜损害他人吗？
All of these things are dollars and cents，you should cherish them.
Zhèxiē dōushì zhíqián de dōngxi，nǐ yīnggāi zhēnxī tāmen。
这些都是值钱的东西，你应该珍惜它们。
This will be a really special gift for them to treasure for always!
Zhè huì chéngwéi tāmen yí jiàn yǒngyuǎn zhídé zhēnxī de tèshū lǐwù。
这会成为他们一件永远值得珍惜的特殊礼物。
He\'d give his ears for a bike of his own.
Tā bùxī yíqiè dàijià yào yōngyǒu yí liàng shǔyú zìjǐ de zìxíngchē。
他不惜一切代价要拥有一辆属于自己的自行车。
He is sparing no expense for the wedding.
Wèile hūnlǐ tā bùxī huāfèi。
为了婚礼他不惜花费。
He stopped at nothing to create the garden he wanted.

他不惜一切代价，打造自己想要的花园。
Perhaps Blair took a leaf out of Thatcher\'s book - win at all costs.

或许布莱尔是以撒切尔夫人为榜样——不惜一切代价都要取胜。

He has a feel for animals.

It\'s a pity he couldn\'t do it.

可惜他做不到这一点。

Jūnguān yīng àixī shìbīng de shēngmìng。

My father never spared the birch.

我的父亲从不吝惜使用桦条鞭。
The critics lavished superlatives on it.
Pínglùnjiā bùxī bǎ zuì yìměizhīcí jiāzhī yú tā。
评论家不惜把最溢美之词加之于它。
我们都为失去一个好同志而感到痛惜。
Wǒmen dōu wèi shīqù yígè hǎo tóngzhì ér gǎndào tòngxī。
We all deeply regretted the loss of such a good comrade.

这位将军非常体惜士兵，得到了士兵们的拥戴。

The general shows great understanding and sympathy for his soldiers, which is why all the soldiers love and respect him.

可惜我去晚了一步，最精彩的节目已经演过了。

可惜的是把这么多时间全浪费了。

可惜他所学非所用。

我想吃清炒豆苗，可惜自己不会做。

I want to eat stir-fried bean seedlings, but I can\'t make the dish myself.
这鼎真精美，只可惜耳子有些破损了。
Zhè dǐng zhēn jīngměi，zhī kěxī ěrzi yǒuxiē pòsǔn le。
The tripod cauldron is exquisite, it\'s a pity the ears have been damaged.
手头的这几件事都要处理，可惜分身乏术。
Shǒutóu de zhèjǐjiàn shì dōuyào chǔlǐ，kěxī fēnshēn fáshù。
I am incapable of dealing with so many matters simultaneously.
文革中下乡的艺术家到现在还有很多都没有归口，真是可惜。
Wéngé zhōng xiàxiāng de yìshùjiā dào xiànzài háiyǒu hěnduō dōu méiyǒu guīkǒu，zhēnshì kěxī。
It is pity that many of the old artists that went to the countryside during the Cultural Revolution haven\'t been able to return to their original professions yet.
这只母鸡肚子里面已经有鸡子儿了，杀了可惜。
Zhèzhī mǔjī dùzi lǐmian yǐjing yǒu jīzir le，shā le kěxī。
This hen has already got some eggs in her stomach, so it would be a pity to kill her.
这种珍稀生物已无噍类了，真是可惜啊。

What a pity that this kind of rare animal has become extinct.
这次的报告会，主题是好的，只可惜内容空乏。

It is regrettable that your skill was neglected because it can be applied nowhere.
他从教师的岗位上离去，大家都觉得可惜。

Everyone thought it was a pity that he left his job as a teacher.
小明从小就脑瓜儿聪明，可惜就是不喜欢学习。

Xiaoming has been clever since he was young, but he doesn’t like studying.
他一直想去五岭看一看，只可惜没时间。

He has always wanted to visit the Five Ridges, but never had the time.
这里以前是个繁华的闹市，只可惜现在草木萧疏。

I really want to help you, but I don\'t have the ability to do so.
妈妈买回好多杏子，可惜大部分是酸的。

Mother bought many apricots, but most of them were sour.
卖花的女孩沿街叫卖，可惜没有人买她的花。
Màihuā de nǚhái yánjiē jiàomài，kěxī méiyǒu rén mǎi tā de huā。
The flower girl sold alongside the road, but no one bought her flowers.
可惜我们公司没有像你这样摇鹅毛扇的。

他这首诗原为你所作，可惜你不喜欢。

He wrote this poem for you. What a pity that you don\'t like it.
远离战争一直是她的愿望，只可惜很难如愿。

Escaping from the war has always been her wish. Unfortunately, it wil be hard to realize.
纸上写着的是音素文字吧，可惜我看不懂。
Zhǐ shàng xiě zhe de shì yīnsù wénzì ba，kěxī wǒ kàn bùdǒng。
What is written on the paper is in a phonemic language, it\'s a pity I can\'t read it.

prepared to pay any price; at any cost; at all costs
小张干活从不惜力。
Xiǎo Zhānggànhuó cóngbùxīlì。
Xiao Zhang never spares himself in his work.
为了名利，他不惜毁身拜誉。
Wèile mínglì，tā bùxī huǐshēn bàiyù。
To get that honor, he ruined his own reputation.
为获高利，他们不惜以次充好。
Wèi huò gāolì，tāmen bùxī yǐ cì chōnghǎo。
To obtain higher profit, they have no hesitation in replacing superior quality products with shoddy products.
他为了这个职位不惜卖友求荣。

He did not hesitate to betray his friend to obtain the position.
为了掩盖自己的罪行，他不惜杀人灭口。

He didn\'t hesitate to kill the witness to cover up the crime.
为了能够擅权，他不惜使用各种卑劣手段。
Wèile nénggòu shànquán，tā bùxī shǐyòng gèzhǒng bēiliè shǒuduàn。
In order to monopolize power, he does not hesitate to use every mean trick.
为了追求真理，他不惜舍身求法。
Wèile zhuīqiú zhēnlǐ，tā bùxī shěshēn qiú fǎ。
He is willing to sacrifice himself for his pursuit of truth.
帝王不惜劳民伤财地为自己建造生圹。

Emperors spared no efforts in constructing tombs for themselves while they were still alive.

He always gives his all at work.

bú lìnxī zìjǐ de lìliang

bú lìnxī qiáncái

bùnéng bùbiǎoshì wǎnxī

纸上写着的是音素文字吧，可惜我看不懂。

What is written on the paper is in a phonemic language, it\'s a pity I can\'t read it.
年轻人要珍惜生活，不要游戏人生。
Niánqīngrén yào zhēnxī shēnghuó，búyào yóuxì rénshēng。
Young people must cherish life and mustn\'t play at it.
那些了不得的作家，谨严入骨，惜墨如金，要把一生的作品，只删存一个或者三四个字。
Nàxiē liǎobu de de zuòjiā，jǐnyánrùgǔ，xīmòrújīn，yào bǎ yìshēng de zuòpǐn，zhǐ shān cún yígè huòzhě sān sì gè zì。
Some important writers are so strict with themselves, so sparing of ink, that they like to pare down the work of a lifetime to three or four words.
我对她不幸的遭遇非常同情，可惜无能为力。

I sympathize with her in her misfortune, but I\'m afraid I can do nothing to help.

我将不惜重金寻找爱犬。

他们想不惜任何代价，使执法系统变质。
Our leaders will protect our territories at all costs.

As the idiom goes, a man of true worth attracts admiration. He has been a teacher all his life, and has won love and respect from the countless students he has taught.

This noble man loves ordinary people like his own sons, and so is respected by the public.

huíyìlù
reminiscences; memoirs; recollections
回忆
huíyì
call (or bring) to mind; recollect; recall

多年以后他歌唱的绕梁之音，我仍记忆犹新。

时人说起那件事来都还历历在目、记忆犹新。

People of that age still remember it vividly to this day.

这件事深深刻在她的记忆中。
I put these memories with those of bygone times.
Wǒ bǎ zhèxiē jìyì yǔ guòqù de shíguāng yìqǐ máizàng le。
我把这些记忆与过去的时光一起埋葬了。
Continuous change results in lack of memorability.
Liánxù de biànhuà dǎozhì méiyǒu zhídé jìyì de shìqing。
连续的变化导致没有值得记忆的事情。
I despair at the flightiness and whimsicality of my memory.
Wǒ duì wǒ de jìyì de piāohūbúdìng hé xīqígǔguài gǎndào juéwàng。
我对我的记忆的飘忽不定和稀奇古怪感到绝望。
Nowadays, you can notate an entire ballet; in the old days, the steps had to be memorized.
Xiànzài，nǐ kěyǐ bǎ suǒyǒu de bāléiwǔ dòng zuòyòng fúhào jìlù xiàlái；dàn zài guòqù，zhèxiē wǔbù zhǐnéng yòng nǎozi jìyì。
现在，你可以把所有的芭蕾舞动作用符号记录下来；但在过去，这些舞步只能用脑子记忆。
These pictures bring back sad memories.
Zhèxiē huàpiàn huànqǐle tòngkǔ de huíyì。
这些画片唤起了痛苦的回忆。
Aren\'t there shades of 1948 here?
Zhèli yǒuméiyǒu guānyú 1948 nián de jìyì ？
这里有没有关于1948年的记忆？
She spoke reminiscently of her days in college.
Tā huíyì qǐ dàxué shí de shēnghuó。
她回忆起大学时的生活。
Could her scarred mind ever be free of fear?
Tā tòngkǔ de huíyì zěnyàng cáinéng cóng kǒngjù zhōng jiětuō？
她痛苦的回忆怎样才能从恐惧中解脱？
She had impressionistic memories of her childhood.
Tā píng yìnxiàng duì zìjǐ de tóngnián yǒuxiē jìyì。
她凭印象对自己的童年有些记忆。
People recode and restructure information in order to remember it.
Rénmen duì xìnxī chóngxīn biānmǎ、 chóngxīn ānpái jiégòu，yǐqī jìyì tāmen。
人们对信息重新编码、重新安排结构，以期记忆它们。
My retrieval of people\'s names is very poor.
Wǒ duì rénmíng de jìyìlì hěn chà。
我对人名的记忆力很差。
He enjoyed remembering his father.
Tā xǐ\'ài huíyì tā de fùqīn。
他喜爱回忆他的父亲。

chāorén de jìyìlì

guòrén de jìyìlì

jìyìlì shuāituì 
one\'s memory is failing

jìyìlì qiáng（ruò）
have a good (poor) memory
视力(记忆力)减退。
Shìlì(jìyìlì) jiǎntuì。
One\'s eyesight (memory) is failing.
我的记忆力日见衰减。
Wǒ de jìyìlì rì jiàn shuāijiǎn。
My memory is failing fast.
他的记忆力真是太好了，默写的内容与原文毫分不差。

jiān bìngjiān 
shoulder to shoulder; side by side

Tā cā zhe wǒ de jiānbǎngzǒu guòqu le。
He brushed past me.

Tā jiānbǎng shàng dā zhe yí kuài máojīn。

他老是拱肩缩背的，显得很没有精气神。
Tā lǎoshì gǒngjiān suōbèi de，xiǎnde hěnméiyǒu jīngqìshén。
He is always hunching his shoulders and bowing his back, which makes him lack spirit and energy.

别看他个子小，他也能肩挑上百斤的东西。

创意小组然后就着手将他们的想法在挑选出来的媒体上付诸实践。
The brief selection of flowering plants listed here should help brighten the darker months.

从在此列举的开花植物中挑选出一些来，可以帮助照亮那些黑暗的岁月。
His positive attitude towards his studies gave me little cause to single him out.
Tā duìyú xuéxí jījí de tàidù shì wǒ bǎ tā tiāoxuǎn chūlái de yìdiǎn yuányīn。
他对于学习积极的态度是我把他挑选出来的一点原因。
to challenge sb to do sth
向某人提出挑战做某事
They reacted irrationally to the challenge of Russian power.
Tāmen duì éjūn de tiǎoxìn zuòchūle hěn bù lǐzhì de fǎnyìng。
他们对俄军的挑衅做出了很不理智的反应。
The exhibition challenges conceptions of high art.
Zhège zhǎnlǎn duì gāojí yìshù de gàiniàn tíchūle tiǎozhàn。
这个展览对高级艺术的概念提出了挑战。
one among thousands
百里挑一的人，罕见(或优异)的人，出类拔萃的人

明信片架上有各种各样的明信片供您选择，你可以挑一张喜欢的，写上内容，然后寄出去。
Many students drop out because they are not prepared for our challenging program.
Xǔduō xuésheng tuìchūle，yīnwèi tāmen méiyǒu wèi zhège chōngmǎn tiǎozhàn de xiàngmù zuòhǎo zhǔnbèi。
许多学生退出了，因为他们没有为这个充满挑战的项目做好准备。

Rèn nǐ tiāoxuǎn yí gè。

挑选演员
tiāoxuǎn yǎnyuán

Technicians carefully picked strong horses and used them as breeding stock.
挑选。
挑选演员。
挑选商品。
Do you plump for a bottle with an attractive label or simply stick to a wine that is familiar?
Nǐ huì tiāoxuǎn yì píng tiēyǒu yí gè yǐnrénzhùyì de biāoqiān de jiǔ háishì jiānchí tiāoxuǎn nǐ cháng hē de jiǔ？

They selected the crayons as to the length of the crayon and not the color.

She finally picked her successor.
Tā zuìzhōng tiāoxuǎnle tā de jìchéngzhě。

挑毛病
tiāo máobìng
find fault
没有十全十美的人，你不要过分挑剔他的毛病。
Méiyǒu shíquán shíměi de rén，nǐ búyào guòfèn tiāotī tā de máobìng。
There is no perfect person. Don\'t always find fault with him.
I\'m getting crazy. She\'s always on my back. I don\'t know what to do.
我要疯了。她总挑我的毛病。我不知道该怎么办了。
On the surface，it is hard to find fault with Carter\'s argument.
Biǎomiàn shàng，hěnnán tiāochū Kǎtè guāndiǎn de máobìng。
表面上，很难挑出卡特观点的毛病。
你的行李太重了，还是雇一个挑夫吧。
Nǐ de xíngli tài zhòng le，háishi gù yígè tiāofū ba。
Your luggage is too heavy. You\'d better hire someone to carry it for you.
The way he dealt with others\' provocation is a demonstration of his cowardice.
他处理别人挑衅的的方法证明了他是个懦夫。
他就爱挑刺儿。
Tā jiù ài tiāocìr。
He\'s always finding fault with people.
挑刺
tiǎocì 
pick out a splinter
他这个人就喜欢在别人的话中挑毛拣刺。
Tā zhège rén jiù xǐhuan zài biérén de huà zhōng tiāomáo jiǎncì。
He likes finding fault with what others say.
挑刺儿。
有的人专门爱挑刺儿。
欢迎大家挑刺儿。
When I was a child, my dad used to take the bones out of the fish for me.
小时侯，父亲总是会帮我把鱼刺挑出去。
I\'ll bone the fish for you, if you promise to finish it.
如果你能保证把鱼都吃完，我就帮你把鱼刺挑出去。
挑来挑去挑花眼了
tiāoláitiāoqù tiāo huāyǎn le

挑来挑去
tiāolái tiāoqù

tiāotiāojiǎnjiǎn

He wobbled up the slope from the river, carrying two buckets of water on a shoulder pole.
光线越来越暗，你去挑挑灯芯。
Guāngxiàn yuèláiyuè àn，nǐ qù tiǎotiǎo dēngxīn。

百里挑一的美人
bǎilǐtiāoyī de měirén 
an exceptional beauty
猖狂的挑衅
chāngkuáng de tiǎoxìn 
reckless provocation
不满一年，他就出挑成一个好司机。
Bùmǎn yìnián，tā jiù chūtiāo chéngyígè hǎosījī。
In less than a year he developed into a good driver.
对挑衅给予有力的反击
duì tiǎoxìn jǐyǔ yǒulì de fǎnjī
answer provocation with a vigorous counterblow
挑个黄道吉日娶亲
tiāo gè huángdàojírì qǔqīn 
choose an auspicious day for wedding
挑拨离间，制造混乱，以便浑水摸鱼
tiǎobōlijiān，zhìzào hùnluàn，yǐbiàn húnshuǐmōyú
sow discord and create confusion so as to fish in troubled waters
挑起纠纷
tiǎoqǐ jiūfēn
stir up trouble
二组跟我们挑战啦。
Er zǔ gēn wǒmen tiǎozhàn la。
Look! Group B has sent us a challenge.
不该挨了批评就撂挑子。
Bùgāi ái le pīpíngjiù liàotiāozi。
It\'s bad to quit one\'s job just because one\'s been criticized.
挑着满满当当的两桶水
tiāo zhe mǎnmǎndāngdāng de liǎngtǒngshuǐ 
carry (or tote) two brimming buckets of water
要说她的工作那是没挑了。
Yào shuō tā de gōngzuò nà shì méitiāo le。
Her work is beyond reproach.
他的英语真没挑。
Tā de yīngyǔ zhēn méitiāo。
He speaks perfect English.
挑拨离间是他的拿手好戏。
Tiǎobōlijiàn shì tā de náshǒuhǎoxì。
He makes a speciality of sowing discord. or He is a past master at sowing discord.
竭尽挑拨离间之能事
jiéjìn tiǎobō líjiàn zhī néngshì
stop at nothing to sow discord
断章取义地挑出片言只语
duànzhāngqǔyì de tiāochū piànyánzhīyǔ
quote a phrase or two out of context

Shìjiè yúlùn qiǎnzé qīnlüèzhě de tiǎoxìn。

任你挑选一个。
Rèn nǐ tiāoxuǎn yí gè。
Choose any one you like.

Gèbiérén gōngkāi tiǎoxìn，gèbiérén àn zhōng shèzhàng。

挑起事端
tiǎoqǐ shìduān

tiāo zhe yí dàn cài

tiāoshuǐ diǎnzhòng

Wǒ kěshì suíbiàn shuō de，nǐ bié tiāo zìyǎnr。

把帘子挑起来
bǎ liánzi tiǎoqǐlái

tiǎo méimao

tiǎo dàmǔzhǐ

tiǎohuǒ

tiǎocì

挑破水泡
tiǎopò shuǐpào

Bǎ wèntí tiǎokāi lái shuō ba。

挑事
tiǎoshì 
stir up trouble; sow discord
这口舌是他挑起来的。
Zhè kǒushé shì tā tiǎo qǐlái de。
It was he who stirred up the quarrel.
挑拨是非
tiǎobō shìfēi 
foment discord
挑拨民族关系
tiǎobō mínzú guānxì 
sow dissension among the various nationalities
中国队把新人放在“挑大梁”的位置上。
Zhōngguóduì bǎ xīnrén fàngzài“tiǎodàliáng”de wèizhi shàng。
The Chinese team put the new players in key positions on the team.
挑灯夜战
tiǎodēngyèzhàn 
fight by torchlight (in ancient times) or continue working by lamplight
挑动是非
tiǎodòngshìfēi 
give rise to (or touch off) a dispute
挑动内战
tiǎodòngnèizhàn 
provoke civil war
挑起边境冲突
tiǎoqǐ biānjìngchōngtū 
provoke a border conflict (or clash)
警惕有人在背后挑唆。
Jǐngtì yǒurén zài bèihòu tiǎosuō。
Beware of people stirring up trouble behind the scenes.
挑头提意见
tiǎotóu tí yìjiàn 
be the first to make suggestions
这是你挑的头儿吧？
Zhè shì nǐ tiǎo de tóur ba? 
You started all this, didn\'t you?

tíchū tiǎoxìnxìng de wèntí

挑战的口吻
tiǎozhàn de kǒuwěn 
a provocative tone
接受挑战
jiēshòu tiǎozhàn 
take up the gauntlet; accept a challenge
他向我挑战，下一盘围棋。
Tā xiàng wǒ tiǎozhàn，xià yì pán wéiqí。
He challenged me to a game of go.
煽风点火，推波助澜，极尽挑拨离间之能事
Shānfēngdiǎnhuǒ，tuībōzhùlán，jí jìn tiǎobōlijiàn zhī néngshì 
fan the flames, add fuel to the fire and do one\'s utmost to incite one against the other
细挑个儿
xìtiao gèr
a tall, slender figure
蓄意挑衅
xùyì tiǎoxìn
premeditated provocation
挑选演员
tiāoxuǎn yǎnyuán
choose the cast
西瓜都经过认真挑选，根据成熟度和个头大小分等出售，不搞“一锅煮”。

Watermelons should be sorted and priced by size and ripeness, not all mixed together.
这场争端是他们一手挑起的。
Zhè chǎngzhēngduān shì tāmen yìshǒu tiǎoqǐ de。
The dispute was all started by them.
扁担的一头挑着篮子，另一头挂着水罐。
Biǎndan de yìtóu tiāozhe lánzi，lìngyìtóu guàzhe shuǐguàn。
A basket was being carried at one end of the shoulder pole, and a water pitcher at the other.
迎接新的挑战
yíngjiē xīn de tiǎozhàn 
meet a new challenge
谢主任早不来，晚不来，偏挑我们实验成功这一天来露面，很明显是来摘桃子的。
Xiè zhǔrèn zǎo bùlái，wǎn bùlái，piān tiāo wǒmen shíyàn chénggōngzhè yìtiān lái lòumiàn，hěn míngxiǎn shì lái zhāi táozi de。
Director Xie has chosen to make his appearance on the very day we have successfully completed our experiment. Clearly he has come to share the glory.
挑起战争
tiǎoqǐ zhànzhēng
provoke a war
挑起争端
tiǎoqǐ zhēngduān 
provoke a dispute
对于这种挑衅，我们不能置之不理。
Duìyú zhèzhǒng tiǎoxìn，wǒmen bùnéng zhìzhībùlǐ。
We cannot ignore such provocations.
敢挑重担
gǎn tiāo zhòngdàn 
dare to shoulder heavy burdens (or responsibilities)
挑选使用高压锅时，一定要注意它的安全阀。
Tiāoxuǎn shǐyòng gāoyāguō shí，yídìng yào zhùyì tā de ānquánfá。
Check the safety valve before you buy or use a pressure pot.
我们挑水的担子都是扁平的。
Wǒmen tiāoshuǐ de dànzi dōushì biǎnpíng de。
The shoulder pole that is used to carry water is flat.
请你把这些数中的纯小数挑出来。
Qǐng nǐ bǎ zhèxiē shù zhōng de chúnxiǎoshù tiāo chūlái。
Please pick out the pure decimal numbers.
每到周末，这里总会有不少父母来为自己的大龄儿女挑对象。
Měi dào zhōumò，zhèlǐ zǒng huì yǒu bùshǎo fùmǔ lái wèi zìjǐ de dàlíng érnǚ tiāo duì xiàng。
On every weekend, many parents come here to select boyfriends/girlfriends for their relatively old daughters/sons.
你看，那些孩子们高挑着红灯笼。
Nǐ kàn，nàxiē háizimen gāotiǎo zhe hóngdēnglong。
Look! Those children are carrying red lanterns on shoulder poles.
她不仅长得漂亮而且身材高挑。
Tā bùjǐn zhǎng de piàoliàng érqiě shēncái gāotiǎo。
She is not only attractive but also tall and thin.
她就是个害人精，总喜欢挑唆别人。
Tā jiùshì gè hàirénjīng，zǒng xǐhuan tiǎosuō biérén。
She is an evil creature, fond of stirring up trouble.
李明爱挑食，从不吃黄豆芽。
Lǐ Míng ài tiāoshí，cóng bùchī huángdòuyá。
Li Ming is very fastidious about food. He never eats soybean sprouts.
他每天走街串巷都挑着他的货郎担。
Tā měitiān zǒujiē chuàn xiàng dōu tiāo zhe tā de huòlángdàn。
He carries his vendor stand and wanders about the streets every day.
别看他个子小，他也能肩挑上百斤的东西。
Biékàn tā gèzi xiǎo，tā yě néng jiāntiāo shàngbǎijīn de dōngxi。
In spite of his short figure, he can carry on his shoulders more than fifty kilos of goods.
现在在青城山上还能看到肩挑，但是已经很少了。
Xiànzài zài Qīngchéng shān shàng hái néng kàndào jiāntiāo，dànshì yǐjing hěnshǎo le。
In Qingcheng Hill, there are still a few people who make a living by carrying goods for others, but their number has diminished.
他在这筐里拣择了好久实在是挑不出来什么好东西。
Tā zài zhè kuāng lǐ jiǎnzé le hǎo jiǔ shízai shì tiāo bùchūlái shénme hǎo dōngxi。
He has been picking from the basket for quite a long while but has failed to select anything nice.
新娘子身材高挑，面容娇好。
Xīnniángzi shēncái gāotiǎo，miànróng jiāohǎo。
The bride has a good figure and a tender face.
他对工作不挑剔，无论多累都肯干。
Tā duì gōngzuò bùtiāotī，wúlùn duō lèi dōu kěngàn。
He is ready to do the work however hard it is.
这件事情办得真是没挑儿了。
Zhèjiàn shìqing bàn de zhēnshì méitiāor le。
This matter has been finished faultlessly.
他年轻的肩膀能够挑起这千斤重担吗？
Tā niánqīng de jiānbǎng nénggòu tiāoqǐ zhè qiānjīn zhòngdàn ma？
Can he shoulder the heavy responsibility when he is so young?
没有十全十美的人，你不要过分挑剔他的毛病。
Méiyǒu shíquán shíměi de rén，nǐ búyào guòfèn tiāotī tā de máobìng。
There is no perfect person. Don\'t always find fault with him.
这个束腰的裙子，越发衬托出了她的高挑婀娜。
Zhège shùyāo de qúnzi，yuè fā chèntuō chū le tā de gāotiāo ēnuó。
This waist-hugging dress sets off her slimness and grace.
他行政和经济双肩挑，每日忙得不可开交。
Tā xíngzhèng hé jīngjì shuāngjiān tiāo，měi rì máng de bùkěkāijiāo。
In charge of both administration and economics, he is as busy as a bee every day.
你的行李太重了，还是雇一个挑夫吧。
Nǐ de xíngli tài zhòng le，háishi gù yígè tiāofū ba。
Your luggage is too heavy. You\'d better hire someone to carry it for you.
我每天都要到山下去挑脚。
Wǒ měitiān dōuyào dào shānxià qù tiāojiǎo。
I go down to the foot of the hill to carry goods every day.
他这个人就喜欢在别人的话中挑毛拣刺。
Tā zhège rén jiù xǐhuan zài biérén de huà zhōng tiāomáo jiǎncì。
He likes finding fault with what others say.
这孩子挑嘴，从来不吃米饭。
Zhè háizi tiāozuǐ，cónglái bùchī mǐfàn。
The child is very choosy about what he eats, and doesn\'t like rice.
他俩最终反目，都是你挑拨离间造成的。
Tā liǎ zuì zhōng fǎnmù，dōushì nǐ tiǎobō líjiān zàochéng de。
They turned against each other, primarily because you had been trying to drive a wedge between them.
他经常受到同学们的挑弄。
Tā jīngcháng shòudào tóngxuémen de tiǎonòng。
He is frequently teased by his classmates.
我最恨那些经常挑弄是非的小人了。
Wǒ zuì hèn nàxiē jīngcháng tiǎonòng shìfēi de xiǎorén le。
What I hate most are those who tell tales.
他为什么平白无故地挑惹他呀？
Tā wèishénme píngbái wúgù de tiǎorě tā ya？
Why did he incur trouble?
我接到了他的挑战书，并答应与他决斗。
Wǒ jiēdào le tā de tiǎozhànshū，bìng dāying yǔ tā juédòu。
He threw down the gauntlet and I accepted his challenge.
我只要细沙，把里面的土坷垃挑出来扔了吧！
Wǒ zhǐyào xìshā，bǎ lǐmian de tǔkělā tiāo chūlái rēng le ba！
I only need silver sand, so pick out and discard the clods of earth!
由于你没能在限时完成任务，挑战失败。
Yóuyú nǐ méinéng zài xiànshí wánchéng rènwù，tiǎozhàn shībài。
Since you didn\'t finish your task within the time limit, you failed.
人家可是一表人才，你还挑剔什么啊。
Rénjia kěshì yìbiǎo réncái，nǐ hái tiāotì shénme a。
He is a man of striking appearance, what are you criticizing for?
技术员精心挑选出强壮的马匹做原种。
Jìshùyuán jīngxīn tiāoxuǎnchū qiángzhuàng de mǎpǐ zuò yuánzhǒng。
Technicians carefully picked strong horses and used them as breeding stock.
你哪知道，他总是挑重活儿做。
Nǐ nǎ zhīdào，tā zǒngshì tiāo zhònghuór zuò。
What do you know; he always volunteers for heavy work.
如果你不挑三拣四，在劳务市场是能够找到一份工作的。

If you are not too choosy, you can find a job in the market.

It was very quiet all around with nobody in sight.
周遭。
I don\'t know what but something in the air says we\'re in big trouble.
我不知道发生了什么事，但周遭的氛围让告诉我们麻烦大了。
The mall has driven many small shops out of the area.
这个商场把周遭很多的小店都给挤走了。
It is well known that displaced workers sustain prolonged income losses while trying to find new jobs.
众所周知，被解雇的工人在试图找到新的职业的同时他们的收入会遭受长时期的损失。
遭罪
Zāozuì
encounter hardship
他因为得罪了人，遭到群殴。
Tā yīnwèi dézuì le rén，zāodào qúnōu。
He was beaten by a group of people because he offended somebody.
他得罪了皇上，遭到了贬谪。
Tā dézuì le huángshàng，zāodào le biǎnzhé。
He was banished from the court for offending the emperor.
他因得罪了黑社会而遭到他们的追杀。
Tā yīn dézuì le hēishèhuì ér zāodào tāmen de zhuīshā。
He was chased by killers after offending the criminal syndicate.
遭罪。
遭罪。
屡屡获罪而遭贬谪。
If you are not guilty and somebody charge you, you have to answer the charge.
如果你没罪却遭到指控，那你就应该进行辩驳。
The lorry driver was not prosecuted for any offence.
Gāi huòchē sījī bú huì yīnwèi rènhé zuìxíng ér zāo qǐsù。
该货车司机不会因为任何罪行而遭起诉。
Vicious crimes against the minority groups were reported.
Wénzhāng bàodào le shǎoshùmínzú zāodàole kěchǐ de fànzuì qīnhài。
文章报道了少数民族遭到了可耻的犯罪侵害。
悲惨的遭遇
bēicǎn de zāoyù 
a tragic experience
她不厌其详地向她朋友诉说她的遭遇。
Tā búyànqíxiáng de xiàng tā péngyou sùshuō tā de zāoyù。
She told her friend in detail all the things she\'d gone through.
故事讲述两姐妹在恋爱和婚姻中的遭遇。
Gùshi jiǎngshù liǎngjiěmèi zài liàn\'ài hé hūnyīn zhōng de zāoyù。
The story tells about the fortunes of two sisters in love and marriage.
欣丰棉纺厂遭遇特大火灾，保险公司理赔2000万。
XīnfēngMiánfǎngchǎngzāoyù tè dà huǒzāi，bǎoxiǎn gōngsī lǐpéi liǎngqiānwàn。

他声泪俱下地诉说了自己的不幸遭遇。
Tā shēnglèijùxià de sùshuō le zìjǐ de búxìng zāoyù。
Tears streamed down his cheeks as he recounted his unhappy experience.
我对她不幸的遭遇非常同情，可惜无能为力。
Wǒ duì tā búxìng de zāoyù fēichángtóngqíng，kěxī wúnéngwéilì。
I sympathize with her in her misfortune, but I\'m afraid I can do nothing to help.
她的遭遇听了令人心酸。
Tā de zāoyù tīng le lìngrén xīnsuān。
Hers is a heart-rending story.
遭遇不幸
zāoyù búxìnɡ
meet with misfortune; have hard luck

Tā hòulái de zāoyù wǒ jiù bùzhīdào le。

The trend of Chinese literature experienced a sudden change. Narrating in colloquial language replaced chanting in classical Chinese.

Jīnnián zāoyù dàfànwéi shuǐzāi，gè bùmén lǐngdǎo nǔlì bǎozhèng wùzī gōngyìng，bú ràng zīyuán jiǎnsǔn，ràng qúnzhòng zhèngcháng shēnghuó。

zāo rén ànsuàn

bēicǎn de zāoyù

xiǎn zāo bú cè

zāo búxìnɡ

cǎn zāo shāhài

zāodào yánzhòng de cuòbài

lǚ zāo cuòzhé

zāo\'è
meet with disaster

zāoshòu fēngzāi

遭到伏击
zāodào fújī

Hěnduō ɡǔdài jiànzhù zāodào huǐsǔn。 
Many ancient buildings have been damaged.
故事讲述两姐妹在恋爱和婚姻中的遭遇。
Gùshi jiǎngshù liǎngjiěmèi zài liàn\'ài hé hūnyīn zhōng de zāoyù。
The story tells about the fortunes of two sisters in love and marriage.
屡遭劫难
lǚ zāo jiénàn 
have experienced many disasters
这座城市遭到空袭。
Zhèzuò chéngshì zāodào kōngxí。
The city was attacked from the air.
遭到冷遇
zāodào lěnɡyù 
be given the cold shoulder; be left out in the cold
欣丰棉纺厂遭遇特大火灾，保险公司理赔2000万。
XīnfēngMiánfǎngchǎngzāoyù tè dà huǒzāi，bǎoxiǎn gōngsī lǐpéi liǎngqiānwàn。
After the big fire,the Xinfeng Textile Factory received a settlement of 20 million yuan from insurance company.
屡遭打击
lǚ zāo dǎjī 
repeatedly came under attack
因遭天灾而歉收
yīn zāo tiānzāi ér qiànshōu
have a bad harvest due to natural disaster
遭到蹂躏
zāodào róulìn
suffer devastation, oppression, outrages, etc.
千千万万的平民百姓在战争中惨遭杀害。
Qiānqiānwànwàn de píngmín bǎixìngzài zhànzhēng zhōng cǎn zāo shāhài。
Thousands upon thousands of civilians were slaughtered during the wars.
惨遭杀戮
cǎnzāo shālù
be massacred in cold blood
遭杀身之祸
zāo shāshēn zhī huò
meet with a fatal disaster
他声泪俱下地诉说了自己的不幸遭遇。
Tā shēnglèijùxià de sùshuō le zìjǐ de búxìng zāoyù。
Tears streamed down his cheeks as he recounted his unhappy experience.
遭到了可耻的失败
zāodào le kěchǐ de shībài
meet with ignominious defeat
他遭敌人杀害，死于非命。
Tā zāo dírén shāhài, sǐyúfēimìng。
He died a violent death, murdered by an enemy.
数万株树木遭损毁。
Shù wàn zhū shùmù zāo sǔnhuǐ。
Tens of thousands of trees were damaged or destroyed.
遭受重大损失
zāoshòu zhóngdà sǔnshī
suffer (or sustain) heavy losses
遭受天灾
zāoshòu tiānzāi 
suffer natural disasters
遭到围攻
zāodào wéiɡōnɡ 
come under attack from all sides; be caught in a cross fire
教练无能，该队屡遭败绩。
Jiàoliàn wúnéng，gāi duì lǚ zāo bàijì。
The coach was incompetent and the team suffered repeated defeats.
我对她不幸的遭遇非常同情，可惜无能为力。
Wǒ duì tā búxìng de zāoyù fēichángtóngqíng，kěxī wúnéngwéilì。
I sympathize with her in her misfortune, but I\'m afraid I can do nothing to help.
遭到可耻下场
zāodào kěchǐ xiàchǎng
come to a disgraceful end; meet with an ignominious fate
先下手为强，后下手遭殃。
Xiān xiàshǒu wéi qiáng，hòu xiàshǒu zāoyāng。
He who strikes first prevails, he who strikes late fails.
险遭不幸
xiǎn zāo búxìnɡ
come within an ace of death
她遭人遗弃，一时想不开就自杀了。
Tā zāo rén yíqì，yìshí xiǎngbu kāi jiù zìshā le。
She was deserted by her lover, and in despair she took her own life.
她的遭遇听了令人心酸。
Tā de zāoyù tīng le lìngrén xīnsuān。
Hers is a heart-rending story.
几遭挫折
jǐ zāo cuòzhé
suffer repeated setbacks
你是遭他骗了。
Nǐ shì zāo tā piàn le。
You have been taken in by him.
用绳子绕两遭
yòngshéngzi rào liǎngzāo
wind the string around twice
在这么多人面前讲话，我还是头一遭。
Zài zhèmeduō rén miànqián jiǎnghuà，wǒ háishi tóu yì zāo。
This is the first time I have ever spoken to such a big audience.
遭到失败
zāodào shībài
suffer (or meet with) defeat
遭到拒绝
zāodào jùjué
meet with refusal; be turned down
遭逢盛世
zāoféngshèngshì
live in prosperous times
遭逢不幸
zāofénɡ búxìnɡ
suffer misfortune
遭际艰危
zāojì jiānwēi
be confronted with difficulties and dangers
遭受损失
zāoshòu sǔnshī
sustain losses
遭受水灾
zāoshòu shuǐzāi
be hit by floods
遭遇不幸
zāoyù búxìnɡ
meet with misfortune; have hard luck
他后来的遭遇我就不知道了。
Tā hòulái de zāoyù wǒ jiù bùzhīdào le。
I don\'t know what became of him later.
敌军怕遭埋伏，战战兢兢地向前移动。
Díjūn pà zāo máifú，zhànzhànjīngjīng de xiàng qián yídòng。
Fearing an ambush, the enemy troops advanced cautiously.
周遭静悄悄的，没有一个人。
Zhōuzāo jìngqiāoqiāo de，méiyǒu yígè rén。
It was very quiet all around with nobody in sight.
遭际
zāojì
circumstances; lot
遭殃
zāoyāng
suffer disaster; suffer
遭到意外打击，他感觉挨闷棍似的难受。
Zāodào yìwài dǎjī，tā gǎnjué ái mèngùn sì de nánshòu。
It was such an unexpected twist of events, that he felt like was hit on the head.
八国联军在进攻北京之前，曾遭到清军和义和团的有力阻击。
Bāguóliánjūn zài jìngōng Běijīng zhīqián，céng zāodào qīngjūn hé yìhétuán de yǒulì zǔjī。
The Allied Forces of Eight Powers had to deal with rigorous resistence from the Qing government\'s army, and the Boxers before they took Beijing.
新制定的改革措施遭到了保守派的强烈反对。
Xīn zhìdìng de gǎigé cuòshī zāodào le bǎoshǒupài de qiángliè fǎnduì。
The newly-formulated reform measures met with fierce opposition from conservatives.
他的遭遇激起大家的悲忿。
Tā de zāoyù jīqǐ dàjiā de bēifèn。
His bitter experience spurred anger in everyone.
过度的放牧使该地区被覆遭到破坏，土地开始荒漠化。
Guòdù de fàngmù shǐ gāi dìqū bèifù zāodào pòhuài，tǔdì kāishǐ huāngmòhuà。
Over-grazing has damaged the vegetation cover of this area, and the land is beginning to show signs of desertification.
人们主张为遭受家庭暴力的妇女设立庇护所。
Rénmen zhǔzhāng wèi zāoshòu jiātíng bàolì de fùnǚ shèlì bìhùsuǒ。
People suggest that care centers should be established for women who suffer from domestic violence.
苏轼多次遭到贬黜。
Sū Shì duō cì zāodào biǎnchù.
Su shi was demoted from his position many times.
他得罪了皇上，遭到了贬谪。
Tā dézuì le huángshàng，zāodào le biǎnzhé。
He was banished from the court for offending the emperor.
我们应当加强防卫，避免后勤补给线遭到破坏。
Wǒmen yīngdāng jiāqiáng fángwè，bìmiǎn hòuqín bǔjǐxiàn zāodào pòhuài。
We should strengthen our defense to protect the safety of the supply line.
这个孩子残虐小动物，遭到了老师的批评。
Zhège háizi cánnüè xiǎodòngwù，zāodào le lǎoshī de pīpíng。
The child was blamed by the teacher for mistreating small animals.
这位英勇的人民警察惨遭歹徒的杀害。
Zhèwèi yīngyǒng de rénmín jǐngchá cǎnzāo dǎitú de shāhài。
This brave policeman was cruelly murdered by the scoundrels.
他的头部遭捶击，当场昏倒。
Tā de tóubùzāo chuíjī，dāngchǎng hūndǎo。
He was knocked on the head and passed out immediately.
最近遭遇三连败，球队的士气大受挫损。
Zuìjìn zāoyù sānliánbài，qiúduì de shìqì dàshòu cuòsǔn。
Recently, with three defeats in succession, the morale of the team has fallen greatly.
遭逢大故，他变得坚强了。
Zāoféng dàgù，tā biàn de jiānqiáng le。
He developed a strong character after his parents\' death.
突然遭受压力或打击时，出现短时间的“情感倒错”是正常的。
Tūrán zāoshòu yālì huò dǎjī shí，chūxiàn duǎn shíjiān de“qínggǎn dàocuò”shì zhèngcháng de。
Temporary insanity is normal after the shock experienced in a great trauma.
由于这座地面站遭到了破坏，附近的无线通讯都中断了。
Yóuyú zhèzuò dìmiànzhàn zāodào le pòhuài，fùjìn de wúxiàn tōngxùn dōu zhōng duàn le。
This ground station has been destroyed, so wireless communication nearby has completely broken down.
这棵大树遭到电击，并燃起了大火。
Zhè kē dàshù zāodào diànjī，bìng ránqǐ le dàhuǒ。
This tall tree was hit by an electric shock and burst into fire.
他遭到毒打后就一直卧床不起。
Tā zāodào dúdǎ hòu jiù yìzhí wòchuáng bùqǐ。
He has been confined to bed after a fierce beating.
他本是去劝解她的，没想到竟遭到了毒骂。
Tā běn shì qù quànjiě tā de，méi xiǎng dào jìng zāodào le dúmà。
He had wanted to persuade her, but was cursed by her instead.
古代，忠臣往往因为直言规谏君王而遭受处罚。
Gǔdài，zhōng chén wǎngwǎng yīnwèi zhíyán guījiàn jūnwáng ér zāoshòu chǔfá。
In ancient times, loyal officials were always punished after directly speaking out against the emperor.
他的性取向横遭大家质疑，他感到十分委屈。
Tā de xìngqū xiàng héngzāo dàjiā zhìyí，tā gǎndào shífēn wěiqū。
His sexual orientation was questioned unexpectedly, making  him feel wronged.
他曾经被扣上过红帽子，遭受了不公的迫害。
Tā céngjīng bèi kòushàng guò hóngmàozi，zāoshòu le bùgōng de pòhài。
He once was stigmatized as a Communist, and suffered unjust persecution.
你们不能怙恃权势就为所欲为，小心遭报应。
Nǐmen bùnéng hùshì quánshì jiù wéisuǒyùwéi，xiǎoxīn zāo bàoying。
You can\'t do as you want relying on power, or you may invite a nemesis.
他因违反公司的规章制度遭到上级的挥斥。
Tā yīn wéifǎn gōngsī de guīzhāngzhìdù zāodào shàngjí de huīchì。
He was chided by the superior because he had violated the company\'s bylaws.
全球变暖致使这种植物遭受毁灭性破坏。
Quánqiú biànnuǎn zhìshǐ zhèzhǒng zhíwù zāoshòu huǐmièxìng pòhuài。
Global warming has caused serious damage to this kind of plant.
谁也不会想到他会遭此祸殃，变成了瘫痪。
Shéi yě búhuì xiǎngdào tā huì zāo cǐ huòyāng，biànchéng le tānhuàn。
No one had thought that he would meet such a disaster and become paralyzed.
他阐述的极左思想，遭到全会人的抨击。
Tā chǎnshù de jízuǒ sīxiǎng，zāodào quánhuì rén de pēngjī。
The extreme left-wing views he espoused were attacked by all those at the meeting.
中国文学潮流遭遇了急变，白话叙事替代文言咏叹。
Zhōngguó wénxué cháoliú zāoyù le jíbiàn，báihuà xùshì tìdài wényán yǒngtàn。
The trend of Chinese literature experienced a sudden change. Narrating in colloquial language replaced chanting in classical Chinese.
今年遭遇大范围水灾，各部门领导努力保证物资供应，不让资源减损，让群众正常生活。
Jīnnián zāoyù dàfànwéi shuǐzāi，gè bùmén lǐngdǎo nǔlì bǎozhèng wùzī gōngyìng，bú ràng zīyuán jiǎnsǔn，ràng qúnzhòng zhèngcháng shēnghuó。
Many areas have been swept by floods this year; in order to make sure that people in these areas lead a normal life, cadres from all sectors have taken measures to ensure the supply of materials.
政府的工业化政策遭到了环保主义者的诘难。
Zhèngfǔ de gōngyèhuà zhèngcè zāodào le huánbǎozhǔyìzhě de jiénàn。
The government\'s industrialization policies were questioned by environmentalists.
政府给遭灾的农民发了救济金。
Zhèngfǔ gěi zāozāi de nóngmín fā le jiùjìjīn。
The government sent out relief funds to farmers in the disaster-stricken area.
因为遭遇百年不遇的大旱，庄稼几乎全部绝产。
Yīnwéi zāoyù bǎinián búyù de dàhàn，zhuāngjià jīhū quánbùjuéchǎn。
Because of a drought the like of which is not seen in a hundred years, there was almost a total crop failure.
奶奶说她小时村里遭过一次大灾，大家都不得不靠啃青度日。
Nǎinai shuō tā xiǎoshí cūn lǐ zāoguò yícì dàzāi，dàjiā dōu bùdébùkào kěnqīng dùrì。
Grandma said that when she was young, her village was once struck by calamity, and villagers had to eat unripe crops.
前不久，这个城市遭受了龙卷风的狂烈袭击，损失很严重。
Qián bùjiǔ，zhège chéngshì zāoshòu le lóngjuǎnfēng de kuángliè xíjī，sǔnshī hěnyánzhòng。
A ferocious tornado attacked the city not long ago, and caused serious damage.
今年这个村遭受了严重的涝害，百姓们损失惨重。
Jīnnián zhège cūn zāoshòu le yánzhòng de làohài，bǎixìngmen sǔnshī cǎnzhòng。
This year the village has suffered a serious water logging catastrophe. The common people have had heavy losses.
他所遭受的缧绁之灾对于他的家庭来说真是难以承受。
Tā suǒ zāoshòu de léixiè zhī zāi duìyú tā de jiātíng láishuō zhēnshì nányǐ chéngshòu。
The disaster of his being put into prision was unbearable to his family.
他泪涟涟地向我们诉说她的不幸遭遇。
Tā lèiliánlián de xiàng wǒmen sùshuō tā de búxìng zāoyù。
He told us his unfortunate experiences with tears in his eyes.
由于农民们没有准备，突然的降温使果树遭受了冷害。
Yóuyú nóngmínmen méiyǒu zhǔnbèi，tūrán de jiàngwēn shǐ guǒshù zāoshòu le lěnghài。
Due to lack of preparation by the farmers, the sudden temperature drop made the fruit trees suffer from the disaster of sudden cold.
他屡遭挫折，但从不气馁。
Tā lǚzāo cuòzhé，dàn cóngbú qìněi。
He was thwarted time and again, but never became down-hearted.
这片棉区遭到了虫害，损失很大。
Zhè piàn miánqū zāodào le chónghài，sǔnshī hěndà。
This cotton area is infested with insects, and the economic toll is heavy.
由于他当晚正好外出，才免遭杀害。
Yóuyú tā dāngwǎn zhènghǎo wàichū，cái miǎnzāo shāhài。
Fortunately he went out that night, or he would have been  killed.
今年庄稼遭了虫灾，肯定是个歉岁了。
Jīnnián zhuāngjià zāo le chóngzāi，kěndìng shì gè qiànsuì le。
The crops suffered from insect plague this year, it will definitely be a lean year.
他因为得罪了人，遭到群殴。
Tā yīnwèi dézuì le rén，zāodào qúnōu。
He was beaten by a group of people because he offended somebody.
他被群小陷害，遭到了不公正对待。
Tā bèi qúnxiǎo xiànhài，zāodào le bùgōngzhèng duìdài。
He was framed by a group of mean people, and received unfair treatment.
我方潜艇遭到了敌军深水炸弹的袭击。
Wǒ fāng qiántǐng zāodào le díjūn shēnshuǐ zhàdàn de xíjī。
Our submarine was attacked by the enemy\'s depth charge.
十年动乱期间，曾有许多艺术品遭到毁坏。
Shí nián dòngluàn qījiān，céng yǒu xǔduō yìshùpǐn zāodào huǐhuài。
Many works of art were destroyed during the ten years of turmoil.
顺民难当，背负骂名还要遭新主猜忌。
Shùnmín nándāng，bēifù màmíng háiyào zāo xīnzhǔ cāijì。
It\'s not easy to be a docile subject, cursed by old friends while suspected by the new master at the same time.
这三个逃课的学生遭到了老师严厉的批评。
Zhè sāngè táokè de xuésheng zāodào le lǎoshī yánlì de pīpíng。
The three students that played truant were severely criticized by the teacher.
他的命真苦，遭遇了这样的天灾人祸。
Tā de mìng zhēn kǔ，zāoyù le zhèyàng de tiānzāi rénhuò。
He\'s got a bad lot, to be struck by such calamities.
他偷了生产队的铁镐，遭到了队长的批评。
Tā tōu le shēngchǎnduì de tiěgǎo，zāodào le duìzhǎng de pīpíng。
He stole the pickaxe from the production team and was therefore criticized by the team leader.
这座铁索桥遭到了严重的破坏，已经不能使用了。
Zhèzuò tiěsuǒqiáo zāodào le yánzhòng de pòhuài，yǐjing bùnéng shǐyòng le。
The chain bridge has been severely damaged and can\'t be used any longer.
侵略者遭到了各地团练的顽强抵抗。
Qīnlüèzhě zāodào le gè dì tuánliàn de wánqiáng dǐkàng。
Invaders encountered dogged defense by local armies organized by landlords all over the country.
突然遭此横祸，他非得脱皮不可。
Tūrán zāo cǐ hénghuò，tā fēi děi tuōpí bùkě。
Suddenly encountering such a terrible misfortune, he must have been seriously hurt.
不要诬枉好人，否则你会遭到报应的。
Búyào wūwǎng hǎorén，fǒuzé nǐ huì zāodào bàoyìng de。
Do not calumniate good people, otherwise you will be punished.
没想到路上居然设有埋伏，他险遭不测。
Méi xiǎngdào lùshàng jūrán shèyǒu máifú，tā xiǎnzāo búcè。
Never expecting an ambush on the road, he had a narrow escape.
侵略者遭到了当地乡勇的攻击。
Qīnlüèzhě zāodào le dàngdì xiāngyǒng de gōngjī。
The invaders are attacked by local military groups.
今年遭天灾又遇人祸，真是一个凶年。
Jīnnián zāo tiānzāi yòu yù rénhuò，zhēnshì yígè xiōngnián。
There have been natural and man-made calamities this year. It is really a bad year.
我们要采取有效措施保护原始林，防止生态遭到破坏。
Wǒmen yào cǎiqǔ yǒuxiào cuòshī bǎohù yuánshǐlín，fángzhǐ shēngtài zāodào pòhuài。
We should take effective measures to protect the primitive forest and prevent the ecology from damage.
这场遭遇战打得十分艰苦，敌我双方伤亡惨重。
Zhèchǎng zāoyùzhàn dǎ de shífēn jiānkǔ，díwǒ shuāngfāng shāngwáng cǎnzhòng。
This contact battle is very hard. Both the enemy, and us have suffered heavy casualties.
百年不遇的洪水，使这个村庄遭受了重灾。
Bǎiniánbúyù de hóngshuǐ，shǐ zhège cūnzhuāng zāoshòu le zhòngzāi。
A flood, the likes of which have not been seen in a hundred years, has devastated this village.
他因得罪了黑社会而遭到他们的追杀。
Tā yīn dézuì le hēishèhuì ér zāodào tāmen de zhuīshā。
He was chased by killers after offending the criminal syndicate.
他常常遭人暗算。
Tā chángcháng zāorén ànsuàn。
He frequently falls prey to other people\'s machinations.
他恨遭人白眼。
Tā hèn zāorénbáiyǎn。
He hates being treated with disdain.
他迟早会遭报应。
Tā chízǎo huì zāobàoyìng。
He\'ll get his just deserts sooner or later.
船身的侧面遭到了猛烈的攻击。
Chuánshēnde cèmiàn zāodàole měngliède gōngjī。
The side of the ship was heavily attacked.
他因为是文盲而遭人嗤笑。
Tā yīnwèi shì wénmáng ér zāorénchīxiào。
He was sneered at because he was illiterate.
这个城市又一次遭受了空袭。
Zhège chéngshì yòuyícì zāoshòule kōngxí.
The city experienced another air raid.
他遭遇失败，处境狼狈。
Tā zāoyù shībài，chǔjìng lángbèi.

xiǎojī

jīxīnxíng de xiōngzhēn

yānhóng de jīguānhuā

阉鸡

他眼巴巴地看着老鹰把小鸡抓走了。
Tā yǎnbābā de kàn zhe lǎoyīngbǎ xiǎojī zhuāzǒu le。
He helplessly looked on when the hawk snatched the chick away.
鸡叫狗咬
jījiào ɡǒuyǎo
cocks crow and dogs bark
摊鸡蛋要多放点油。
Tān jīdàn yào duō fàngdiǎn yóu。
You have to put in more oil when making an omelet.

jīzhēnr 
chicken\'s gizzard

zhǔ jīdàn

养鸡“状元”
yǎnɡjī &quot;zhuànɡyuɑn&quot;
a champion chicken-raiser
小鸡正在啄米呢。
Xiǎojī zhèngzài zhuómǐ ne。
The chicks are pecking at the rice.

jīguān

子鸡
zǐjī

仔鸡
zǐjī

我特别爱吃白斩鸡。
Wǒ tèbié ài chī báizhǎnjī。
I like eating boiled chicken very much.
我从集市上买回来两只草鸡。
Wǒ cóng jíshì shàng mǎi huílái liǎng zhī cǎojī。
I bought two hens from the market.
现在不是草鸡的时候，一定要想办法冲过去。
Xiànzài búshì cǎojī de shíhou，yídìng yào xiǎng bànfǎ chōng guòqù。
This is not the time for cowardice, we must think of a way to charge ahead.
工厂门口经常有一个老汉卖茶鸡蛋。
Gōngchǎng ménkǒu jīngcháng yǒu yígè lǎohàn mài chájīdàn。
An elderly man is always selling boiled tea eggs in front of the factory gates.
他中午吃了一盘炒饼，两个鸡蛋。
Tā zhōng wǔ chī le yì pán chǎobǐng，liǎng gè jīdàn。
He had a plate of fried cake and two eggs for lunch.
他在饭店买了一盘鸡蛋炒饭。
Tā zài fàndiàn mǎi le yì pán jīdàn chǎofàn。
He bought a plate of fried rice with scrambled eggs from the restaurant.
这只烤鸡吃口不错呀！
Zhèzhī kǎojī chīkǒu búcuò ya！
The roast chicken is delicious.
鸡翅子上的肉我最爱吃。
Jīchìzi shàng de ròu wǒ zuì àichī。
Chicken wing meat is my favorite.
他就是一个瓷公鸡，怎么可能借给你钱呢。
Tā jiùshì yígè cí gōngjī，zěnme kěnéng jiègěi nǐ qián ne。
He is such a stingy person, how can it be possible that he would lend money to you?
鸡一打鸣儿，她就起床准备早饭了。
Jī yì dǎmíngr，tā jiù qǐchuáng zhǔnbèi zǎofàn le。
She gets up to prepare breakfast as soon as she hears the rooster crow.
这只烤鸡是用电烤箱烤的，味道不错。
Zhèzhī kǎojī shì yòng diànkǎoxiāng kǎo de，wèidào búcuò。
This roast chicken was roasted in an electric oven and is very delicious.
这里的村民们都喜欢在农闲的时候斗鸡。
Zhèlǐ de cūnmínmen dōu xǐhuan zài nóngxián de shíhou dòujī。
The villagers have a lot of fun watching cock fighting in their leisure time.
一群孩子在操场上斗鸡，笑声不断。
Yì qún háizi zài cāochǎng shàng dòujī，xiàoshēng búduàn。
The bunch of children played the rooster game in the playground with a lot of laughter.
他整天斗鸡走狗，不务正业。
Tā zhěngtiān dòujī zǒugǒu，bùwù zhèngyè。
He idles away one day after another, without attending to his duties.
这只烤鸡肥嫩鲜美，真是好吃！
Zhèzhī kǎojī féinèn xiānměi，zhēnshi hǎochī！
This lightly roasted chicken tastes delicious.
父亲从老家给我们带来了风鸡。
Fùqīn cóng lǎojiā gěi wǒmen dàilái le fēngjī。
My father brought an air-dried chicken for us from my hometown.
我要把这些麸壳儿带回去喂鸡。
Wǒ yào bǎ zhèxiē fūkér dài huíqù wèi jī。
I will take this wheat bran home to feed the chickens.
使用这种技术可以人工孵育小鸡。
Shǐyòng zhèzhǒng jìshù kěyǐ réngōng fuyù xiǎojī。
One can achieve artificial incubation by applying this technology.
鸡鸭的浮尸把这条小河污染了。
Jīyā de fúshī bǎ zhètiáo xiǎohé wūrǎn le。
The river has been polluted by floating corpses of chickens and ducks.
割鸡焉用牛刀？你留下吧，让小王去处理这件事就可以了。
Gējī yānyòng niúdāo？ Nǐ liúxià ba，ràng Xiǎo Wáng qù chǔlǐ zhèjiànshì jiù kěyǐ le。
Why use an ox-cleaver to kill a chicken? You stay here and let Xiao Wang deal with this.
他有吃鸡蛋壳的怪癖。
Tā yǒu chī jīdànké de guàipǐ。
He has a strange hobby of eating eggshells.
他穿得太花了，活脱脱一只大火鸡。
Tā chuān de tài huā le，huótuōtuō yìzhī dàhuǒjī。
His clothes are too flowery, which make him look just like a big turkey.
这只鸡雏刚出生没多久，走路还不稳当呢。
Zhèzhī jīchú gāng chūshēng méi duōjiǔ，zǒulù hái bùwěndāng ne。
This chick was born not long ago, and is not even able to walk steadily.
炒鸡丁的时候炒得太久，肉会不嫩的。
Chǎojīdīng de shíhou chǎo de tài jiǔ，ròu huì búnèn de。
If you stir-fry the small cubes of chicken for too long, the meat won\'t stay tender.
会场场面失控了，变得鸡飞狗跳，一片混乱。
Huìchǎng chǎngmiàn shīkòng le，biàn de jīfēi gǒutiào，yí piàn hùnluàn。
The assembly went out of control and became a scene of turmoil.
这道汤里放了鸡精，味道鲜美多了。
Zhè dào tāng lǐ fàng le jījīng，wèidào xiānměi duō le。
This soup tastes much more delicious with a kind of chicken powder seasoning.
做事一定要鸡口牛后，努力向前。
Zuòshì yídìng yào jīkǒu niúhòu，nǔlì xiàng qián。
It\'s better be a dog\'s head than a lion\'s tail. We must continuously improve ourselves.
用鸡毛菜包的包子是很好吃的。
Yòng jīmáocài bāo de bāozi shì hěnhǎo chī de。
Steamed buns with turnip seedlings as stuffing are very delicious.
战争时期我军经常用鸡毛信传递重要信息。
Zhànzhēng shíqī wǒ jūn jīngcháng yòng jīmáoxìn chuándì zhòngyào xìnxī。
During the war, our army often used letters attached with a chicken feather to deliver important messages.
高处的灰尘一定要用鸡毛帚才打扫得到。
Gāochù de huīchén yídìng yào yòng jīmáozhǒu cái dǎsǎo de dào。
You have to use a chicken-feather duster to clean the dust in high places.
一看她的鸡皮就知道她年纪很大了。
Yíkàn tā de jīpí jiù zhīdào tā niánjì hěndà le。
Her goose flesh shows that she is already of an advanced age.
她没有什么本事，坐这个位置真的是鸡栖凤巢，大家都不太满意。
Tā méiyǒu shénme běnshì，zuò zhège wèizhi zhēn de shì jīqī fèngcháo，dàjiā dōu bú tài mǎnyì。
None of us approve of her occupying this good position without having any real ability.
他们两家鸡犬相闻，很久以前关系就很好了。
Tāmen liǎng jiā jīquǎn xiāngwén，hěnjiǔ yǐqián guānxì jiù hěnhǎo le。
Living near each other, their families have had a good relationship for a long time.
鸡头米可做药用，是一种很稀有的植物。
Jītóumǐ kě zuò yàoyòng，shì yìzhǒng hěnxīyǒu de zhíwù。
Gordon euryale is a rare plant which can be used as a medicine.
这对鸡血石的镯子成色很好。
Zhè duì jīxuèshí de zhuózi chéngsè hěnhǎo。
The quality of this pair of bloodstone bracelets is very good.
鸡恉可以煮汤喝，味道还不错。
Jīzhǐ kěyǐ zhǔtāng hē，wèidào hái búcuò。
Mushrooms can be made into soup and taste good.
家养的鸡生出的蛋比较大，但是味道却不怎么样。
Jiāyǎng de jī shēngchū de dàn bǐjiào dà，dànshì wèidào què bùzěnmeyàng。
Domesticated chicken lays bigger eggs, but they don\'t taste so good.
事事靠己是不现实的，要学会借鸡生蛋。
Shìshì kào jǐ shì bú xiànshí de，yào xuéhuì jièjī shēngdàn。
It is impossible to do eveything by yourself; you have to learn to work with others.
草丛中传来野鸡啾唧的声音。
Cǎocóng zhōng chuánlái yějī jiūjī de shēngyīn。
The pheasants chirped in the bush.
这个养殖场准备引进几百只来航鸡。
Zhège yǎngzhíchǎng zhǔnbèi yǐnjìn jǐ bǎi zhī láihángjī。
This aquatic breeding farm is going to introduce hundreds of Leghornos.
这家饭店做的醪糟鸡蛋味道很好。
Zhèjiā fàndiàn zuò de láozāo jīdàn wèidào hěnhǎo。
The glutinous rice wine with fried eggs at this restaurant is tasty.
他在料斗里装满了饲料，准备去喂鸡。
Tā zài liàodǒu lǐ zhuāngmǎn le sìliào，zhǔnbèi qù wèijī。
He filled the hopper with feed, and prepared to feed the chickens.
六畜是马、牛、羊、猪、狗、鸡这六种家畜家禽的合称。
Liùchù shì mǎ、niú、yáng、zhū、gǒu、jī zhè liùzhǒng jiāchù jiāqín de héchēng。
The six domestic animals refer to the horse, ox, goat, pig, dog and chicken.
这家餐厅今天的半价菜是卤鸡。
Zhèjiā cāntīng jīntiān de bànjiàcài shì lǔjī。
Pot-stewed chicken in the restaurant is being sold at a 50% discount today.
卤制的鸡蛋很受欢迎，很多人都爱吃。
Lǔzhì de jīdàn hěnshòu huānyíng，hěnduōrén dōu àichī。
Egg stewed with spices in salty water or soy sauce is very popular, and many people like it.
南豆腐鸡蛋汤是很好吃的一道菜。
Nándòufu jīdàntāng shì hěnhǎo chī de yídào cài。
The soup of tender bean curd, and egg is delicious.
在小公司里当个总经理，比在大公司里当部门经理更能锻炼人的管理才能，所以他“宁为鸡口，无为牛后”。
Zài xiǎo gōngsī lǐ dāng gè zǒngjīnglǐ，bǐ zài dà gōngsī lǐ dāng bùmén jīnglǐ gèng néng duànliàn rén de guǎnlǐ cáinéng，suǒyǐ tā“níngwéi jīkǒu，wúwéi niúhòu”。
A person\'s managerial ability will improve more as a general manager of a small company than as a department manager in a big one. He therefore chose to be the beak of a chicken than the rump of an ox.
路过德州时，我们品尝到了正宗的德州扒鸡。
Lùguò Dézhōu shí，wǒmen pǐncháng dào le zhèngzōng de Dézhōu pájī。
We tasted some authentic Dezhou braised chicken when we passed through Dezhou.
他今天凌晨就起来干活，真是牝鸡司晨。
Tā jīntiān língchén jiù qǐlái gànhuó，zhēnshì pìnjī sīchén。
He started working after he got up in the early morning, which is rare.

这盘凉拌素鸡真好吃。

Chicken crops can be made into Chinese traditional medicines to help people digest food.
请给我煎一个溏心鸡蛋。
Qǐng gěi wǒ jiān yígè tángxīn jīdàn。
I\'d like to have an egg fried on one side.

The dining hall of my workplace always serves watery egg soup.
妈妈答应这周末给我和弟弟做香酥鸡吃。

Mother promised to cook crisp chicken for my brother and me this weekend.
我们用压力锅炖鸡汤，节省了时间和煤气。

With the help of the pressure-cooker, we cook chicken soup with less time and gas.

一眨眼的功夫他就把烧鸡给吃光了。

He ate up the entire roast chicken in a short time.
咱家还有鸡蛋吗？
Zánjiā háiyǒu jīdàn ma？

雄火鸡；雄吐绶鸡
This problem is precisely a chicken and egg situation.

yīfù quánɡuì 
attach oneself to bigwigs
词话这种文学形式要依附于词的发展而发展。

依附
依附。
爬山虎依附墙壁生长。
依附权势。
依附于他人。
I have never been attached to him.

我从来都没有依附于他。
Grammatical morphemes affix to the stem.
Yǔfǎ císù yīfùyú cígàn。
语法词素依附于词干。

星团是星体依靠重力作用附着在一起而构成的。

huóhuà xīfù

adsorption

他们发明了液体吸附能力很强的餐巾纸。

He echoed whatever I said. He\'s a flatterer!
随声附和别人的说法
suíshēngfùhè biérénde shuōfǎ
echo the views of others
他的讲话真荒唐，但有很多人随声附和。
Tā de jiǎnghuà zhēn huāngtáng，dàn yǒu hěnduō rén suíshēngfùhè。
What he says is ridiculous, yet many people echo his words.
随声附和
随声附和
文件后面附加两项说明。
Wénjiàn hòumiàn fùjiāliǎng xiàng shuōmíng。
The document has two explanatory notes attached to it.
你把与这件事有牵连的人的名单附后。

他错过了触地得分后的附加得分，现在的比分是16-11。
He then converted his only successful kick of the match.

附着
fùzhuó
adhere to; stick to

附着(ｚｈｕó)
信后还附着几句话
附着。
这种虫子的卵就附着在树叶上
Star clusters are groups of stars which are gravitationally bound.
星团是星体依靠重力作用附着在一起而构成的。

骨骼与附着于其上的肌肉部分保持相当紧密的关系。
The leaves are dependent of the plant.

叶子附着于植物上。

阴虱是附着在阴毛上的浅棕色的扁平小虫。
A heated hydraulic press was required for adhesion.
Wèile huòdé fùzhuólì，xūyào rèlì shuǐyā。

Fùzhuó pínghuá jiànmó de jīròu。
附着平滑腱膜的肌肉。
The shell of a sessile barnacle is attached directly to a substrate.
Gù zhe ténghú de wàiké zhíjiē fùzhuó zài jīzhì shàng。
固着藤壶的外壳直接附着在基质上。
A pedunculate barnacle is attached to the substrate by a fleshy foot or stalk.
Yǒu ròujīng de ténghú tōngguò ròuzú huò ròujīng fùzhuózài jīzhì shàng。
有肉茎的藤壶通过肉足或肉茎附着在基质上。
Spikes provide greater traction.
Dīngxié kě tígōng gèng dà de fùzhuó mócālì。

第一个水能驱动的棉纺厂的古迹在那条河上的桥附近。
You will find catalogues for the current exhibition in the stands near the display cases.
Nǐ huì zài zhǎnpǐn guì fùjìn de táizi shàng zhǎodào mùqián zhǎnlǎn de mùlù。
你会在展品柜附近的台子上找到目前展览的目录。
A postscript must be added to the story.
Zhège gùshi bìxū jiāshàng yí gè fùlù。
这个故事必须加上一个附录。
The shell of a sessile barnacle is attached directly to a substrate.
Gù zhe ténghú de wàiké zhíjiē fùzhuó zài jīzhì shàng。
固着藤壶的外壳直接附着在基质上。
He goes to the neighborhood highschool.
Tā zài fùjìn de zhōngxué shàngxué。
他在附近的中学上学。
A pedunculate barnacle is attached to the substrate by a fleshy foot or stalk.
Yǒu ròujīng de ténghú tōngguò ròuzú huò ròujīng fùzhuózài jīzhì shàng。
有肉茎的藤壶通过肉足或肉茎附着在基质上。
Never have a name and address tag on your keys.
Bié bǎ xìngmíng hé dìzhǐ fù zài nǐ jiā yàoshi shàng。
别把姓名和地址附在你家钥匙上。
Mine hometown is a small town around London.
我的家乡在伦敦附近的一个小镇上。
Persistent leaves remain attached past maturity.
Bù diāoxiè de yèzi réng fù zài shúguò de guǒshí shàng。
不凋谢的叶子仍附在熟过的果实上。
Extra charges were tacked on to the bill.
Fùjiā fèiyòng yě bèi xiě zài le zhàngdān shàng。
附加费用也被写在了账单上。
I leased an apartment close to my company, so I can walk to work.
我租到了一个公司附近的公寓，所以我可以走路去上班。
A country will become a client to other countries if it relies on the country economically.
一个国家如果经济上依赖另一个国家，那她就会变成那个国家的附庸。
他们签订了合同，并附白英文翻译。
Tāmen qiāndìng le hétong，bìng fùbái yīngwén fānyì。
They signed the contract and attached an English version.
If you agree to the above terms, please sign the enclosed copy of the contract.
Rúguǒ nǐ tóngyì yǐshàng tiáokuǎn，qǐng zài fùshàng de hétong fùyìnjiàn shàng qiānzì。
如果你同意以上条款，请在附上的合同复印件上签字。
词典的十二个附录
cídiǎn de shí\'èr gè fùlù
the twelve appendices to the dictionary
详见附录。
Xiángjiàn fùlù。
For details, see the appendix.
随信附上商品目录一份。
Suí xìn fùshàng shāngpǐn mùlù yí fèn。
A catalogue of commodities is enclosed herewith.
这张附表详细的记录了正文所提到的数据。
Zhèzhāng fùbiǎo xiángxì de jìlù le zhèngwén suǒ tídào de shùjù。
The attached table records data mentioned above in detail.
这篇文章除附录外，只有5000字
正文之外还有附录
正文后面附录有关资料备考。
条约之外附加一份备忘录
For details, see the appendix.
详见附录。
The pertinent information has been added in the supplement.
相关信息已经添加在附录中了。
For the number of records produced to date see appendix A.
Yǒuguān qìjīn suǒ chǎnshēng de jìlù shùliàng qǐng cānjiàn fùlù A。
有关迄今所产生的记录数量请参见附录A。

Zhège gùshi bìxū jiāshàng yí gè fùlù。

你会在展品柜附近的台子上找到目前展览的目录。
在附近的饭馆里包饭
zài fùjìn de fànguǎn lǐ bāofàn 
board at a nearby restaurant
附近地区
fùjìn dìqū
nearby regions
附近的城市
fùjìn de chéngshì
neighbouring (or adjacent) towns
住在工厂附近
zhù zài gōngchǎng fùjìn
live close to the factory
附近有没有邮局？
Fùjìn yǒu méiyǒu yóujú?
Is there a post office near here?
就在附近，几分钟就可走到。
Jiù zài fùjìn，jǐ fēn zhōng jiù kě zǒudào。
It\'s only a few minutes\' walk from here.
附近的旅馆都客满，只好到朋友家过夜。
Fùjìn de lǚguǎn dōu kè mǎn，zhǐhǎo dào péngyou jiā guòyè。
All the hotels in the area are full. We\'ll have to go spend the night in a friend\'s home.
永定河和大清河在天津附近合流。
YǒngdìngHé hé DàqīngHé zài tiānjīn fùjìn héliú。
The Yongding and Daqing rivers meet near Tianjin.
这家工厂抢占了附近学校的一块地。
Zhèjiā gōngchǎngqiǎngzhàn le fùjìn xuéxiào de yí kuài dì。
The factory unlawfully built on a piece of land which belongs to a nearby school.
我们工厂每周放电影，附近小孩儿都沾光。
Wǒmen gōngchǎngměi zhōu fàngdiànyǐng，fùjìn xiǎoháir dōu zhānguāng。
Kids in the neighbourhood enjoy the chance of seeing our factory\'s weekly film.
确切地址我记不清了，总之是在颐和园附近。
Quèqiè dezhǐ wǒ jì bu qīng le，zǒngzhī shì zài Yíhéyuán fùjìn。
I can\'t remember the exact address. Anyway, it\'s somewhere near the Summer Palace.
昨天在安全岛附近我看见他帮助一位老人过马路。
Zuótiān zài Ānquándǎo fùjìn wǒ kànjiàn tā bāngzhù yíwèi lǎorén guò mǎlù。
I saw him helping an old man across the street by the pedestrian area.
隔壁的大嫂是附近有名的包打听。
Gébì de dàsǎo shì fùjìn yǒumíng de bāodǎtīng。
The woman who lives next door loves gossip very much.
报贩都爱在公共汽车站附近设点。
Bàofàn dōu ài zài gōnggòng qìchēzhàn fùjìn shèdiǎn。
Roadside newspaper sellers all prefer bus stops.
他所在的部队就驻扎在边防线附近。
Tā suǒzài de bùduì jiù zhùzhā zài biānfángxiàn fùjìn。
His army is stationed near the border line.
这个饼屋在附近很有名气。
Zhège bǐngwū zài fùjìn hěnyǒu míngqì。
This cake shop is famous in the neighborhood.
附近的农户对匪徒之残毒恨之入骨。
Fùjìn de nónghù duì fěitú zhī cándú hènzhīrùgǔ。
The thugs\' cruelty is the pet hate of the farmers in the neighbourhood.
我军奋战三个月终于剿清了这附近的残匪。
Wǒ jūn fènzhàn sāngè yuè zhōng yú jiǎoqīng le zhè fùjìn de cánfěi。
After three months\' fight, our army finally eliminated the remaining thugs.
警方正在对附近的区域进行查控。
Jǐngfāng zhèngzài duì fùjìn de qūyù jìnxíng chákòng。
The police are keeping the surrounding area under surveillance.
我家附近新开了一家超级市场。
Wǒjiā fùjìn xīn kāi le yìjiā chāojí shìchǎng。
A new supermarket has just opened near my home.
附近的船民都是世居此地，祖祖辈辈以打鱼为生。
Fùjìn de chuánmín dōushì shìjū cǐdì，zǔzǔbèibèi yǐ dǎyú wéishēng。
All the neighboring boatmen have lived here and made a living by fishing for generations.
附近的三个村社都是小康村。
Fùjìn de sāngè cūnshè dōushì xiǎokāngcūn。
All the three neighboring villages are well-off villages.
他们几个人都姓大姓，你去附近问问。
Tāmen jǐgè rén dōu xìng dàxìng，nǐ qù fùjìn wènwèn。
They all have popular surnames, you can ask about them in the neighborhood
这个山区附近的地矿资源非常丰富。
Zhège shānqū fùjìn de dìkuàng zīyuán fēicháng fēngfù。
The vicinity of mountainous area is rich in geological minerals.
由于这座地面站遭到了破坏，附近的无线通讯都中断了。
Yóuyú zhèzuò dìmiànzhàn zāodào le pòhuài，fùjìn de wúxiàn tōngxùn dōu zhōng duàn le。
This ground station has been destroyed, so wireless communication nearby has completely broken down.
附近所有的居民都搬走了，只剩下几个钉子户。
Fùjìn suǒyǒu de jūmín dōu bānzǒu le，zhǐ shèngxià jǐgè dīngzihù。
All the residents nearby have moved away, except for a few householders who are holding out.
狼群把猎物拖进了附近的洞子中。
Lángqún bǎ lièwù tuōjìn le fùjìn de dòngzi zhōng。
Wolves dragged the prey into a nearby cave.
在火药库附近没有及时熄灭烟火，就留下了祸种，随时会引起火灾。
Zài huǒyàokù fùjìn méiyǒu jíshí xīmiè yānhuǒ，jiù liúxià le huòzhǒng，suíshí huì yǐnqǐ huǒzāi。
Those unextinguished butts near the powder magazine could cause a fire at any time.
洪水激剧上涨，淹没了附近的村庄。
Hóngshuǐ jījù shàngzhǎng，yānmò le fùjìn de cūnzhuāng。
The flood rapidly rose, submerging the neighboring villages.
他家是这附近的尖子户，很早就盖起了两层的小楼。
Tā jiā shì zhè fùjìn de jiānzihù，hěnzǎo jiù gàiqǐ le liǎng céng de xiǎolóu。
His family is the richest in this area and has taken a lead in building a two-story house.
因为经常坐在电脑前工作，我们肩胛附近的肌肉已经损伤。
Yīnwéi jīngcháng zuòzài diànnǎo qián gōngzuò，wǒmen jiānjiǎ fùjìn de jīròu yǐjing sǔnshāng。
Due to heavy work load in front of the computer, I\'ve hurt a muscle near the scapula.
加油站附近禁燃可燃物品。
Jiāyóuzhàn fùjìn jìnrán kěrán wùpǐn。
Combustible substances are forbidden near gas stations.
你出门一定要注意安全，这附近常有马贼出没。
Nǐ chūmén yídìng yào zhùyì ānquán，zhè fùjìn cháng yǒu mǎzéi chūmò。
You should be very careful outside as mounted gangsters often appear nearby.
请问这附近哪里有毛厕？
Qǐngwèn zhè fùjìn nǎlǐ yǒu máocè？
Excuse me, where is the nearest toilet?
那个泡子里有鱼，所以常有水鸟在附近栖息。
Nàge pàozi lǐ yǒu yú，suǒyǐ chángyǒu shuǐniǎo zài fùjìn qīxī。
There are some fish in the small lake, so many water birds live beside it.
他想在附近租一间铺面房做生意。
Tā xiǎng zài fùjìn zū yìjiān pùmiànfáng zuò shēngyì。
He wants to rent a room in the shop building near here to run a business.
这次台风给附近的桑农带来了不小的损失。
Zhècì táifēng gěi fùjìn de sāngnóng dàilái le bùxiǎo de sǔnshī。
The typhoon has brought great losses to the nearby mulberry planters.
最近河水的色度有些偏黄，是不是附近存在污染源啊？
Zuìjìn héshuǐ de sèdù yǒuxiē piānhuáng，shì bùshì fùjìn cúnzài wūrǎnyuán a ？
Recently the chroma of the river water is a little yellowish. Does there exist any polluting sources nearby?
他的善行得到了附近居民的赞赏。
Tā de shànxíng dédào le fùjìn jūmín de zànshǎng。
His kind deeds were praised by neighboring citizens.
请问这附近哪里有停车场呀？
Qǐngwèn zhè fùjìn nǎlǐ yǒu tíngchēchǎng ya？
Is there a parking lot near here?
你别寻事，告诉你警察就在附近。
Nǐ bié xúnshì，gàosù nǐ jǐngchá jiùzài fùjìn。
Do not look for trouble. The police are around.
扬州附近流行的一种扬剧，你可以听听。
Yángzhōu fùjìn liúxíng de yìzhǒng yángjù，nǐ kěyǐ tīngtīng。
This kind of Yangzhou opera is popular around Yangzhou, you can listen.
窑场附近都是窑坑 ，雨天容易积水。
Yáochǎng fùjìn dōushì yáokēng，yǔtiān róngyì jīshuǐ。
There are pits dotted around the brick kiln, water collects in them after rain.
为了方便居民，开发商决定在小区附近增建一片商业区。
Wèile fāngbiàn jūmín，kāifāshāng juédìng zài xiǎoqū fùjìn zēngjiàn yípiàn shāngyèqū。
In order to provide convenience for the residents, the developer decided to build one more industrial zone near the housing estate.
附近有电话亭吗？
Fùjìn yǒu diànhuàtíng ma？
Is there a telephone box in the vicinity?
附近商店有各种装修材料，我们不必舍近求远。
Fùjìn Shāngdiàn yǒu gèzhǒng zhuāngxiūcáiliào，wǒmen búbì shějìnqiúyuǎn。
The local shops have all sorts of decorating materials – there\'s no need for us to go far afield.
看完电影之后，他们去了附近的一家餐馆。
Kànwán diànyǐng zhīhòu，tāmen qùle fùjìn de yìjiā cānguǎn。
After seeing a film, they went to a nearby restaurant.

专家正在测试盆地附近那条河里的水。

我的家乡在伦敦附近的一个小镇上。

你可以听到附近潺潺的流水声。
The supermarket near your place is very convenient.
你家附近的那个超市很方便。
The kids who live opposite are always playing around.
住在对面的几个孩子经常在附近玩耍。

我在住宅区附近的小卖铺买了一包绿茶。
I have a pack of coyotes living near my home.
我家附近有一窝土狼。

警察就守在附近，以防止暴乱的发生。
They are shooting a movie in a town near my village right now.
他们现在正在我们村附近的镇上放电影。
The house of my aunt is located next to the tower of the old castle.
我姑姑的房子就坐落在老城堡内那座塔的附近。
There are live coals near the volcano.
火山附近仍有正在燃烧的熔岩。
When they were landing, a mine explode across the field.
他们登陆时，一颗水雷在附近区域爆炸了。
Is there a subway station near here?
这附近有地铁站吗？
They work just off the Ritz hotel parking lot.
他们就在里兹酒店的停车场附近工作。
My aunt lives near a fruit farm and helps to pick pears.
我姨妈家附近有一处果园，她经常去帮忙摘梨。
He is going somewhere around Central park.
他正要到中央公园附近的什么地方去。
It is very easy to find a restaurant around here.
在这附近找到一家饭店很容易。
I live in an old red-brick house in a village near London.
我住在伦敦附近村庄一所老旧的红砖房里。
My cap was lost somewhere over here yesterday.
昨天我在这儿附近把帽子丢了。

我想我把相机的镜头盖丢在附近了。
We found a cave near the farm.
我们在农场附近发现了一个洞穴。
They are building a clinic near here.
他们正在附近建一家诊所。

警方在银行附近逮捕了他。
Living near work is very convenient.
在工作地点附近居住非常方便。
Police are all around the Administration block to prevent attacks from the terrorists.
为了防止恐怖分子袭击，政府大楼附近到处都是警察。
Please clean all the windows by the door.
把门附近的所有窗户都擦一下。
Commuters that live near each other and share a common destination form the simplest and most common carpool arrangement.
住在附近的上班族，如果上班地点相同，通常采用最简单最常见的方式一起上班--拼车。
Public toilets and baby changing facilities are located near to principal entrance to the shopping centre.
购物中心的正门附近有公厕和婴儿便利设施。
There\'s a new cinema near to my home. It is a large multiplex cinema on 3 floors and has latest projection and sound technology.
我家附近新开了一家影院。电影院很大，是个三层的电影城，有最先进的投影和声效设施。
Her house is close to the mountain.
她家就住在那座山的附近。

城镇附近的国家公园占地6641平方公里。
He imagined the cries of children playing nearby.
他想象着孩子们在附近玩耍时的吵闹声。

We don\'t live around here.
我们不住在附近。
to be (near {or} close) at hand
在附近
Three shells had landed close to a crowd of people.
3颗炮弹在人群附近落下。
a small village just outside Birmingham
在伯明翰附近的小村庄
I got a place at a teachers\' training college nearby.
我得到了附近师范学院的一个名额。
We were nearing the point where the lane curved round to the right.
我们在道路向右转弯这个位置附近。
Waikiki Beach is near Honolulu.
怀基基海滩在火奴鲁鲁附近。
I have decided to move to a place near the company.
我已决定搬到公司附近来住。
You can have a good view of this area from the summits of nearby fells.
从附近的山顶上，你可以很好地看到这个地区的全貌。
When I was young I went swimming in the lake near my house every summer.
小时候，我每年夏天都去家附近的湖里游泳。
I leased an apartment close to my company, so I can walk to work.
我租到了一个公司附近的公寓，所以我可以走路去上班。

工厂附近的这条街很脏。
Ben broke a wood panel near the door.
本把门附近的板条弄坏了。

我不知道格兰特家的准确位置，但我知道是在鱼市附近。

这个镇附近的急流给运河建造者带来了麻烦。
The skyscraper rears high over the neighboring buildings.
这座摩天大楼高耸于附近的建筑之中。

Suǒfù zhīpiào yīng bāokuò yùnshū hé guǎnlǐ de fèiyòng。
所附支票应包括运输和管理的费用。
Fallopian tubes and ovaries are adnexa of the uterus.
Shūluǎnguǎn hé luǎncháo shì zǐgōng de fùshǔ bùfen。
输卵管和卵巢是子宫的附属部分。
They are linked to a varying number of satellite groups.
Tāmen hé yìxiē shùmù duō biàn de fùshǔ tuántǐ liánxì zài yìqǐ。
他们和一些数目多变的附属团体联系在一起。
The planets orbiting nearby are venus and mars.
Zài fùjìn yùnxíng de xíngxīng shì Jīnxīng hé Huǒxīng。
在附近运行的行星是金星和火星。
Other affiliates operate in other European countries and all around the world.
Qítā fùshǔ gōngsī fēnbùzài qítā ōuzhōu guójiā hé quánshìjiè。
其他附属公司分布在其他欧洲国家和全世界。
I need a little extra light on the music stand to see the pages and notes.
Wǒ xūyào zài yuèpǔ jià fùjìn duō yìdiǎn dēngguāng yǐbiàn kànqīng yèmǎ hé yuèpǔ。
我需要在乐谱架附近多一点灯光以便看清页码和乐谱。
Virtually every change in land ownership around the town involved them in some way or other.
Shíjìshàng，xiǎozhèn fùjìn tǔdì suǒyǒuquán de měi cì gǎibiàn dōu huòduōhuòshǎo hé tāmen yǒuguān。
实际上，小镇附近土地所有权的每次改变都或多或少和他们有关。
Olives and sliced meats are also a nice accompaniment to a cheese plate.
Gǎnlǎn hé ròupiàn tóngyàng yě shì gānlào pán zhōng hěn měiwèi de fù cài。
橄榄和肉片同样也是干酪盘中很美味的附菜。

我家附近新开了一家影院。电影院很大，是个三层的电影城，有最先进的投影和声效设施。

附带说一句
fùdài shuōyíjù
mention in passing

The typhoon has brought great losses to the nearby mulberry planters.

附带说明如下
附带问题不难处理

a conditional award
有附带条件的奖品

附带

附在皮带上的小皮圈

fùdài shuōyíjù

suíshēngfùhè biérénde shuōfǎ

在附近

Huà shí yuán，xiě shí fāng; hán shí duǎn，rè shí cháng。—— Dǎ yí zì。（mídǐ：rì）
When drawn it is round, but when written it is square; in cold weather it is short, and in hot weather long. —A character. (Answer: the character 日 &quot;sun, day&quot;)

One can not have a skyrocketing rise in study, just like Rome was not built in a day.

只见寒光一闪，他的宝剑已经出鞘。

一阵寒风吹过，我猛地打了一个激灵。
Yízhèn hánfēng chuīguò，wǒ měng de dǎ le yígè jīlǐng。
I shivered suddenly when a cold wind passed by.
小王的家境清寒，没钱买营养的东西吃，因此身体十分瘠瘦。

Xiao Wang\'s family is poor and doesn\'t have enough money to buy nutritious food, so he is very thin.
他幼时家况贫寒，吃了很多的苦，现在生活终于有所好转。
Tā yòushí jiākuàng pínhán，chī le hěnduō de kǔ，xiànzài shēnghuó zhōng yú yǒusuǒ hǎozhuǎn。
When he was a child, he had many hardships, due to the  poor financial situation of his family, but now it is much better.
解放后老百姓再也不用过饥寒交迫的日子了！
Jiěfàng hòu lǎobǎixìng zài yě búyòng guò jīhán jiāopò de rìzi le！

Jǔjiàng kěyǐ xíngqì huàtán、qūfēng sànhán。
The betel pepper can promote the circulation of qi and reduce phlegm, as well as dispel wind and expel cold.
荞麦是一种抗寒农作物，富含粗纤维和多种营养。
Qiáomài shì yìzhǒng kànghán nóngzuòwù，fùhán cūxiānwéi hé duōzhǒng yíngyǎng。
Buckwheat is a kind of cold-resistant crop containing coarse fiber and is very nourishing.

Hándōng làyuè，wàibiān lěngfēng xírén。

冷冽的寒风吹得路上的行人浑身打颤。

The chilly wind makes passers-by shiver all over.

Chūchūn de hánfēng yīrán shì lěngqiào xírén。

一阵寒风吹来，他不由得打了一个冷颤。
Yízhèn hánfēng chuīlái，tā bùyóudé dǎ le yígè lěngchàn。
A gust of cold wind blows, and he can\'t help shivering.
栗烈寒风，吹的人直发抖。
Lìliè hánfēng，chuī de rén zhí fādǒu。
The chilly wind makes us shiver all over.
经过寒暑不辍的努力，他终于练就了一手的好字。
Jīngguò hánshǔ bùchuò de nǔlì，tā zhōng yú liànjiù le yì shǒu de hǎozì。

明天气温将降到零下，请市民们注意防寒。

The temperature will be below zero tomorrow. Tell citizens to be aware of the bitter cold.
他浑身被雨淋透了，寒风一吹就不住地瑟索。
Tā húnshēn bèi yǔ líntòu le，hánfēng yí chuī jiù bú zhù de sèsuǒ。
He was drenched, and couldn\'t help shivering in the cold wind.
现在是深冬，一年中最冷的时候，大家一定要注意防寒。

It\'s the depth of winter, the coldest time of the year. Take care to keep yourself warm!

It\'s our fate in our past lives that has brought us together. I hope that you can often visit my little house!

每辆自行车在曲柄轴附近都有一个序列号。

老师让学生们用升序列出偶数。
We can estimate this by comparing molecular sequences in the two species.
Wǒmen kěyǐ tōngguò bǐjiào liǎng gè wùzhǒng lǐ de fēnzǐ xùliè lái gūsuàn。
我们可以通过比较两个物种里的分子序列来估算。
Once the entire human genome has been sequenced it will become amenable to manipulation.

一旦确定整个人类基因组的结构序列，它将变得易于操纵。

序列音乐可以根据不同的风格创作而成。
He invented a technique to determine the sequence of base pairs in dna.
Tā fāmíngle yìzhǒng jìshù lái cèdìng DNA de jiǎnjīduì xùliè。
他发明了一种技术来测定DNA的碱基对序列。
The number &quot;one&quot; begins the sequence.

这个序列以数字“1”开始。
Every number has a unique position in the sequence.
Měi gè shùzì zài xùliè zhōng dōu yǒu tèdìng de wèizhi。
每个数字在序列中都有特定的位置。
I alphabetically aligned my books on the book shelf.
我把书按照字母表顺序排列在书架上。
Put the books on the shelf and arrange them in alphabetical order.
把书放在架子上，并把他们按字母顺序排列好。
The sequence of names was alphabetical.
Xìngmíng àn zìmǔshùnxù páiliè。
姓名按字母顺序排列。
The list was arranged alphabetically.
Míngdān shì àn zìmǔ shùnxù páiliè de。
名单是按字母顺序排列的。
The cards are all alphabetized, as you requested.
Zhèxiē kǎpiàn quánbù gēnjù nǐ de yāoqiú àn zìmǔ shùnxù páiliè hǎo le。
这些卡片全部根据你的要求按字母顺序排列好了。
Cyril and Method alphabetized the Slavic languages.
Xīlǐěr hé Màisèdé àn zìmǔ shùnxù páilièle Sīlāfūyǔzú。
西里尔和麦瑟德按字母顺序排列了斯拉夫语族。
The spike pierced the receipts and held them in order.
Nàgè dīngzi chuānguò nàxiē shōujù bìng shǐ zhī àn shùnxù páiliè。
那个钉子穿过那些收据并使之按顺序排列。
Venation is the distribution of veins in a leaf.
脉序是叶片中各叶脉的排列分布状态。

This shop is in good order, calling out all the received and paid money.

Wūzi lǐ chǎochǎorǎngrǎng，zhìxù hùnluàn。

他是一名程序员，工作相当出色。
