He is an excellent programmer.
王羲之的《兰亭序》传本很多，以冯承素摹本流传最为普遍。
Wáng Xīzhī de《Lántíngxù》chuánběn hěnduō，yǐ Féng Chéngsù móběn liúchuán zuì wéi pǔbiàn。
Among all the book editions of Lantingxu that have been handed down, the calligraphy of Wangxizhi in the copy made by Fengcheng Su is the most popular one.
我们要规制市场秩序，保护公平竞争。
Wǒmen yào guīzhì shìchǎng zhìxù，bǎohù gōngpíng jìngzhēng。
We should regulate market rules and protect fair competition.
我们一定要随时控扼这个会场的秩序。
Wǒmen yídìng yào suíshí kòngè zhège huìchǎng de zhìxù。
We must always maintain order in the assembly hall.
这是一座蝶式立交桥，去往各个方向的车辆井然有序。
Zhè shì yízuò diéshì lìjiāoqiáo，qùwǎng gègè fāngxiàng de chēliàng jǐngrán yǒuxù。
This is a butterfly-shaped crossroads. The vehicles driving towards all directions are in good order.
对于成家和立业的顺序问题，我和妈妈各自有不同的见解。
Duìyú chéngjiā hé lìyè de shùnxù wèntí，wǒ hé māma gèzì yǒu bùtóng de jiànjiě。
My mother and I hold different opinions regarding whether one should marry before they have a successful career.
这件事情的具体程序他已经了了于心了。
Zhèjiàn shìqing de jùtǐ chéngxù tā yǐjing liǎoliǎo yú xīn le。
He has already known clearly about the detailed procedures of this matter.
计算机编程的任何一步的漏失，都会导致程序无法正常运转。
Jìsuànjī biānchéng de rènhé yíbù de lòushī，dōu huì dǎozhì chéngxù wúfǎ zhèngcháng yùnzhuǎn。
A computer program cannot operate if any procedure is lost.
这些毛茶要经过复杂的工序加工后才能出售。
Zhèxiē máochá yào jīngguò fùzá de gōngxù jiāgōng hòu cáinéng chūshòu。
These raw tea leaves can be sold only after complex processing.
城市里的摩的有时很烦人，影响交通秩序和行人安全。
Chéngshì lǐ de módí yǒushí hěn fánrén，yǐngxiǎng jiāotōng zhìxù hé xíngrén ānquán。
Motorcycles used to carry passengers in cities can be quite annoying, have bad impact on traffic, and the safety of pedestrians.
这部电影采用了逆序的叙事手法。
Zhèbù diànyǐng cǎiyòng le nìxù de xùshì shǒufǎ。
The movie narrates the story in reverse order.
这份名单的排名顺序依据的是姓氏笔画。
Zhè fèn míngdān de páimíng shùnxù yījù de shì xìngshì bǐhuà。
This list of surnames is arranged in the order of the number of strokes.
请大家遵守剧场秩序，按号入坐。
Qǐng dàjiā zūnshǒu jùchǎng zhìxù，ànhào rùzuò。
Please abide by the rules of the theater. Take your seat according to your seat number.
下一道工序是在墙面上涂抹一层沙浆。
Xià yídào gōngxù shì zài qiángmiàn shàng túmǒ yì céng shājiāng。
The next procedure is to daub a layer of mortar on the wall.
时序循环自有定律，我们也应该应时而动，随季节变化而调整自己的生活起居。
Shíxù xúnhuán zìyǒu dìnglǜ，wǒmen yě yīnggāi yìngshí ér dòng，suí jìjié biànhuà ér tiáozhěng zìjǐ de shēnghuó qǐjū。
There are rules for the alternation of seasons, and we should adjust our living habits according to them.
随着岁序更新，我们又长大了一岁。
Suí zhe suìxù gēngxīn，wǒmen yòu zhǎngdà le yí suì。
We are another year older as each year goes on.
我们必须严厉打击囤积居奇，扰乱市场秩序的行为。
Wǒmen bìxū yánlì dǎjī túnjī jūqí，rǎoluàn shìchǎng zhìxù de xíngwéi。
We must take strong measures against actions of hoarding and profiteering that upset the market.
假日市场混乱无序，必须进一步加强管理。
Jiàrì shìchǎng hùnluàn wúxù，bìxū jìnyíbùjiāqiáng guǎnlǐ。
The holiday market is very disorganized, and needs further management.
部队在行进中衔尾相随，井然有序。
Bùduì zài xíngjìn zhōng xiánwěi xiāngsuí，jǐngrán yǒuxù。
The soldiers walk one by one in good order.
电影散场了，影院里秩序井然，人们相率走出。
Diànyǐng sànchǎng le，yǐngyuàn lǐ zhìxù jǐngrán，rénmén xiāngshuài zǒuchū。
The movie is over, and the audience walk out orderly.
小强7岁入了痒序，到14岁就中了秀才。
Xiǎo Qiáng qīsuì rù le yǎngxù，dào shísìsuì jiù zhòng le xiùcái。
Xiao Qiang entered the town school at the age of 7 and became a scholar at the age of 14.
学校里讲得是序齿入座，你找人也没用。
Xuéxiào lǐ jiǎng de shì xùchǐ rùzuò，nǐ zhǎorén yě méiyòng。
All is arranged in order of seniority at school. It\'s no use for you to look for connections.
座位上都有序号，你们对号入座。
Zuòwèi shàng dōu yǒu xùhào，nǐmen duìhào rùzuò。
There are serial numbers on the seats. You should sit according to the numbers.
这本书的序论是他的导师写的，很值得一看。
Zhèběnshū de xùlùn shì tā de dǎoshī xiě de，hěn zhídé yí kàn。
The preface, written by his supervisor, is worth reading.
春节晚会的序目在网上公布了，影响不小。
Chūnjié wǎnhuì de xùmù zài wǎngshàng gōngbù le，yǐngxiǎng bùxiǎo。
The performing list of the spring gala aroused a large interest after its release on the internet.
书的序目有点乱，还需要再调整一下。
Shū de xùmù yǒudiǎn luàn，hái xūyào zài tiáozhěng yíxià。
The preface and table of contents of the book are a bit messy and need further adjustment.
古人很讲究雁行有序。
Gǔrén hěn jiǎngjiū yànxíng yǒuxù。
People in ancient times were particular about the positions of seniors and juniors.
这部工具书是按照音序编制索引的。
Zhèbù gōngjùshū shì ànzhào yīnxù biānzhì suǒyǐn de。
The reference book is indexed in alphabetic order.
中国封建社会讲究长幼有序、尊卑有别。
Zhōngguó fēngjiànshèhuì jiǎngjiū chángyòu yǒuxù、zūnbēi yǒubié。
In the feudal society of China, it was generally accepted that seniority should be respected, and that the respected should be treated differently from inferiors.
如何使市场经济有序运行成了又一课题。
Rúhé shǐ shìchǎng jīngjì yǒuxù yùnxíng chéng le yòu yí kètí。
How to run an orderly market economy became another problem.
小王在程序启动前就已经预设了反黑客装置。
Xiǎo Wáng zài chéngxù qǐdòng qián jiù yǐjing yùshè le fǎnhēikè zhuāngzhì。
Xiaowang has set up an anti-hacker device before starting the program.
任何人借阅原案都必须经过严格的审批程序。
Rènhé rén jièyuè yuánàn dōu bìxū jīngguò yángé de shěnpī chéngxù。
Anyone who borrows the original must go through a strict examination and approval process.
我刚刚更新了造字程序。
Wǒ gānggāng gēngxīn le zàozì chéngxù。
I have just updated the character-creation program.
由于电脑的子程序出现问题，导致整个系统都瘫痪了。
Yóuyú diànnǎo de zǐchéngxù chūxiàn wèntí，dǎozhì zhěnggè xìtǒng dōu tānhuàn le。
A problem with the subprogram has paralyzed the entire system.
民事诉讼法和刑事诉讼法都属于程序法。
Mínshì sùsòngfǎ hé xíngshì sùsòngfǎ dōu shǔyú chéngxùfǎ。
Both civil procedure law, and criminal procedure law are procedural laws.
程序控制技术已经得到了很大的发展。
Chéngxù kòngzhì jìshù yǐjing dédào le hěndà de fāzhǎn。
Program control has been developed greatly.
软件的开发需要由程序设计的专业人员来完成。
Ruǎnjiàn de kāifā xūyào yóu chéngxù shèjì de zhuānyè rényuán lái wánchéng。
Software development needs to be done by programmer.
机器语言是程序员需要掌握的最基本的知识。
Jīqì yǔyán shì chéngxùyuán xūyào zhǎngwò de zuì jīběn de zhīshi。
Machine language is the fundamental knowledge a programmer needs to have.

Tā bàotiàorúléi de fā le yídùn píqi。
He stormed and raged in a fit of temper.
暴死于雷击。
Did you see last night\'s awesome lightning storm?
你昨晚看到那可怕的雷暴了吗？
Her flight was delayed for several hours due to the thunderstorm.
Yóuyú chūxiàn léibào，tā de hángbān yánwùle hǎo jǐ gè xiǎoshí。
由于出现雷暴，她的航班延误了好几个小时。
The crash occurred during a thunderstorm and the system has been down ever since.

to be hopping mad
[inf] 气得暴跳如雷
to go nuts
暴跳如雷
Jack reared up when he found out that he was befooled.
杰克发现自己被骗了后暴跳如雷。
He went ape over the news.
Tā tīngdào zhège xiāoxi bàotiàorúléi。
他听到这个消息暴跳如雷。
The boss exploded when he heard of the resignation of the secretary.
Dāng lǎobǎn tīngdào mìshū cízhí de xiāoxi shí，tā bàotiàorúléi。
当老板听到秘书辞职的消息时，他暴跳如雷。
She vented her anger.
Tā bàotiàorúléi。
她暴跳如雷。
He will raise the roof when he hears this.
Tā tīngdào zhège xiāoxi huì bàotiàorúléi de。
他听到这个消息会暴跳如雷的。
At that moment a clap of thunder exploded directly overhead as the storm burst.
Zài nàgè shíhòu，bàofēngyǔ tūrán láixí，yí gè xiǎngléi zài tóudǐng zhíjiē zháxiǎng le。
在那个时候，暴风雨突然来袭，一个响雷在头顶直接炸响了。
我哥哥是个雷达兵，他回家时我总缠着他给我讲雷达侦察的事情。
Wǒ gēge shì gè léidábīng，tā huíjiā shí wǒ zǒng chán zhe tā gěi wǒ jiǎng léidá zhēnchá de shìqing。
My elder brother is a radar man. Every time he goes home, I always importune him to tell me about stories of radar detection.
我们现在所在的地方是雷区，我们要时刻防备被雷电击中。
Wǒmen xiànzài suǒzài de dìfāng shì léiqū，wǒmen yào shíkè fángbèi bèi léidiàn jīzhòng。
The place we are living in now is thunder-stricken. We must be careful every minute so we are not struck by thunderbolt.
前面的水域布有很多水雷，看来我们要调用几艘扫雷舰了。
Qiánmian de shuǐyù bùyǒu hěnduō shuǐléi，kànlái wǒmen yào diàoyòng jǐ sōu sǎoléijiàn le。
The frontal water area is laid with many torpedoes. It appears that we should deploy some mine sweepers.

It\'s going to rain, because the thunder is rumbling outside.
近几年来，他在这个行业频频触雷。

The Leifeng Spirit will be handed down forever and we should all learn from it.
他在心中打闷雷，想着这到底是怎么回事。
Tā zài xīn zhōng dǎ mènléi，xiǎng zhe zhè dàodǐ shì zěnme huí shì。
He makes random guesses, and then wonders what the hell has happened.
本社即将出版《哈姆雷特》单行本。
Běnshè jíjiāng chūbǎn《Hāmǔléitè》dānxíngběn。
This press will publish a separate edition of Hamlet.
演出之后掌声雷动，演员数次返场谢幕。
Yǎnchū zhīhòu zhǎngshēng léidòng，yǎnyuán shùcì fǎnchǎng xièmù。
The performance won thundering applause and the actors and actresses gave several encores at the request of the audience.
昨晚，我看了复排的《雷雨》。
Zuówǎn，wǒ kàn le fùpái de《Léiyǔ》。
Last night, I watched the new &quot;Thunderstorm&quot;.
一声惊雷，山石崩裂，美猴王孙悟空横空出世。
Yìshēng jīngléi，shānshí bēngliè，měihóuwáng Sūnwùkōng héngkōng chūshì。
After mountains collapse and the rocks crack followed a deafening thunder, Monkey King Sun Wukong was born.
今天华中大部分地区有雷阵雨。
Jīntiān huá zhōng dàbùfen dìqū yǒu léizhènyǔ。
Today most parts of Central China will have thundershowers.
他坚持去敬老院照顾那些无儿无女的老人，大家都说他是活雷锋。
Tā jiānchí qù jìnglǎoyuàn zhàogù nàxiē wúér wúnǚ de lǎorén，dàjiā dōu shuō tā shì huóléifēng。
He perseveres in taking care of elderly people without any children. We all regard him as a living Lei Feng.
那棵树被雷劈到，燃烧起来，远看就像一个火柱。
Nà kē shù bèi léi pīdào，ránshāo qǐlái，yuǎnkàn jiù xiàng yígè huǒzhù。
That tree was struck by lightening and caught fire, looking like a fire pillar from afar.
这声焦雷使玻璃都在振动。
Zhè shēng jiāoléi shǐ bōli dōu zài zhèndòng。
The thunderclap vibrates the window panels.
半夜里，一声炸雷使我从梦中惊觉。
Bànyèlǐ，yìshēng zhàléi shǐ wǒ cóng mèngzhōng jīngjué。
I woke up with a start to the sound of midnight thunder.
《哈姆雷特》是我们话剧院的看家戏。
《Hāmǔléitè》 shì wǒmen huàjùyuàn de kānjiāxì。
Hamlet is the outstanding play of our modern drama troupe.
今晚预报有雷暴雨，你路上一定要小心开车。
Jīnwǎn yùbào yǒu léibàoyǔ，nǐ lùshàng yídìng yào xiǎoxīn kāichē。
According to the weather report, there is thunderstorm tonight. Take care while driving on the road.
前方是雷场，请不要再往前行驶了。
Qiánfāng shì léichǎng，qǐng búyào zài wǎngqián xíngshǐ le。
In front there is land mine field. Please don\'t drive any further.
这位战士驻守在这个雷达站已经有三年的时间了。
Zhèwèi zhànshì zhùshǒu zài zhège léidázhàn yǐjing yǒu sān nián de shíjiān le。
The soldier has been garrisoned at the radar station for more than three years.
这个地方经常发生雷害。
Zhège dìfāng jīngcháng fāshēng léihài。
This place often suffers from thunder catastrophe.
前方已到雷区，请大家小心行路，注意路上的标示。
Qiánfāng yǐ dào léiqū，qǐng dàjiā xiǎoxīn xínglù，zhùyì lùshàng de biāoshì。
In front it will be the mine field. Please watch your steps and pay attention to the signs on the road.
他做事一贯是雷声大雨点小，有头没尾的。
Tā zuòshì yíguàn shì léishēng dà yǔdiǎn xiǎo，yǒutóu méiwěi de。
He is always a person of much cry and little wool. Everything he does always ends in nothing.
空中雷霆一响，就把孩子吓哭了。
Kōng zhōng léitíng yìxiǎng，jiù bǎ háizi xià kū le。
The thunderbolt came from the sky, and frightened the child into crying.
由于没有达到要求，教练对队员们大发雷霆。
Yóuyú méiyǒu dádào yāoqiú，jiàoliàn duì duìyuánmen dàfā léitíng。
Because the players didn\'t reach his standards, the coach flew into a rage.
长江以雷霆万钧之势，咆哮而下，滚滚东流，昼夜不息。
Cháng Jiāng yǐ léitíngwànjūn zhīshì，páoxiào érxià，gǔngǔn dōngliú，zhòuyè bùxī。
The Yangtze River roared east, billowing with irresistible force day and night.
春节时，我放了一个麻雷子。
Chūnjié shí，wǒ fàng le yígè máléizi。
I set off a large firecracker during Spring Festival.
空军基地安装有很多具有抛物面的雷达探测器。
Kōngjūn jīdì ānzhuāng yǒu hěnduō jùyǒu pāowùmiàn de léidá tàncèqì。
Many parabolic radar detectors have been installed in the air force base.
中国足球队终于走向世界了，这可真是平地一声雷的大喜讯啊。
Zhōngguó zúqiúduì zhōng yú zǒu xiàng shìjiè le，zhè kě zhēnshì píngdì yìshēngléi de dà xǐxùn a。
China\'s football team has finally gone global, which is really an unexpected happy event.
这种鱼雷是专门用来攻击潜水艇的。
Zhèzhǒng yúléi shì zhuānmén yònglái gōngjī qiánshuǐtǐng de。
The fish torpedo is specially used to attack submarines.
听了他的话，小刚感觉如五雷轰顶，痛苦不堪。
Tīng le tā de huà，Xiǎo Gāng gǎnjué rú wǔléi hōngdǐng，tòngkǔ bùkān。
Xiao Gang felt like he was struck by a bolt of lightening when he heard what he said.
因为孙悟空搅了蟠桃盛会，西王母大发雷霆。
Yīnwéi Sūnwùkōng jiǎo le pántáoshènghuì，Xīwángmǔ dàfā léitíng。
The Queen Mother of the West was furious at Sun Wukong because he ruined her peach party.
神话传说中的雷锋塔其实就坐落在西子湖畔。
shénhuàchuánshuō zhōng de léifēngtǎ qíshí jiù zuòluò zài xīzǐ húpàn。
The Leifeng Tower in the legend is actually located by the side of the West Lake in Hangzhou.
雷锋助人为乐的懿德影响了一代又一代人。
Léifēng zhùrén wéilè de yìdé yǐngxiǎng le yídài yòu yídài rén。
Lei Feng\'s admirable virtue of taking delight in helping people has influenced people from generation to generation.
雷锋助人为乐的精神将永存我们心中！
Léifēng zhùrén wéilè de jīngshén jiāng yǒngcún wǒmen xīn zhōng ！
Leifeng\'s spirit of taking pleasure in helping others will stay in our minds forever!
雷达荧光屏显示敌人的飞机正在迅速向我军靠近。
Léidá yíngguāngpíng xiǎnshì dírén de fēijī zhèngzài xùnsù xiàng wǒ jūn kàojìn。
The radar fluorescent screen shows that the enemy\'s plane is approaching us rapidly.
鱼雷艇在第二次世界大战中发挥了重要作用。
Yúléitǐngzàidìèr cì shìjiè dàzhàn zhōng fāhuī le zhòngyào zuòyòng。
Torpedo boats played an important role during World War Two.
雷锋嫉恶如仇，他决不会容许这样的事情发生的。
Léi Fēng jí\'èrúchóu，tā jué búhuì róngxǔ zhèyàng de shìqing fāshēng de。
只要稍不顺意，他就大发雷霆。
Zhǐyào shāo búshùnyì，tā jiù dàfāléitíng。
He would be furious if there is the slightest mistake.
虽然雷锋不在了，可他助人为乐的精神却万古长青！
Suīrán Léi Fēng búzài le，kě tā zhùrénwéilè de jīngshén què wàngǔchángqīng！
Lei Feng is no longer alive, but his spirit will remain fresh forever!
我被你的帖子雷到了。
Wǒ bèi nǐde tiězi léidào le。
I\'m astonished at your post.

chuàngzào qíjì 
create miracles; work wonders; achieve prodigious feats
这真是名副其实的奇迹。

That\'s a veritable miracle.

mù wéi qíjì

a marvel of medical science

rénjiān qíjì
a man-made miracle

tàn wéi qíjì
admire and praise sth. as a wonderful achievement

lìshǐ shàngwèicéngyǒuguo de qíjì 
a miracle unprecedented in history

没有充足的迹象表明那个候选人会赢得竞选。
The sign was visibly displayed.
Jìxiàng míngxiǎn de xiǎnshì chūlái le。
迹象明显地显示出来了。
These signs bode bad news.
Zhèxiē jìxiàng búshì hǎo zhēngzhào。
这些迹象不是好征兆。
What is more，there\'s no sign of a change.
Érqiě，gēnběn méiyǒu biànhuà de jìxiàng。
而且，根本没有变化的迹象。
There was little other sign of progress.
jīhū méiyǒu qítā biǎomíng jìnzhǎn de jìxiàng。
几乎没有其它表明进展的迹象。
Hewlett\'s book is riddled with signs of infection.
xiū lì tè de shū chōngmǎnle bèi gǎnrǎn de jìxiàng。
休利特的书充满了被感染的迹象。
But there is still little sign of that kind of shift.
dàn wǒmen jīhū kànbúdào chūxiàn zhèzhǒng zhuǎnbiàn de jìxiàng。
但我们几乎看不到出现这种转变的迹象。
This is a miraculous and supernatural act of God.
Zhè shì yí gè qíjìbān bùkě kàng de chāo zìrán xiànxiàng。
这是一个奇迹般不可抗的超自然现象。
伤口愈合后尚留有缝线痕迹
血迹斑斑
xuèjī bānbān
bloodstained
对笔迹
duì bǐjì

他的笔迹容易辨认。
Tā de bǐjì róngyì biànrèn。
His handwriting is easy to identify.

Yǒu jì xiàng biǎomíng huìtán jíjiāng huīfù。

wèi le biǎozhāng tā shēngqián de shìjì

参观名胜古迹
cānguān míngshènggǔjì

这里还残留着战争的痕迹。
Zhèlǐ hái cánliú zhe zhànzhēng de hénjì。

猖獗多年的天花，终于灭迹了。
Chāngjué duōnián de tiānhuā，zhōngyú mièjì le。

畅游名胜古迹
chàngyóu míngshènggǔjì

Yánshí shàngyǒu bèi hóngshuǐ chōngshuāguò de hénjì。
The rocks carry marks left by a flood.

chuàngzào qíjì

动人的事迹
dòngrén de shìjì

他的先进事迹十分感人。
Tā de xiānjìn shìjì shífēn gǎnrén。
His meritorious deeds are very moving.
字迹工整
zìjì gōngzhěng

轮子的痕迹
lúnzi de hénjì

旧社会的痕迹
jiù shèhuì de hénjì

罪犯没有留下任何作案的痕迹。
Zuìfàn méiyǒu liú xià rènhé zuò\'àn de hénjì。
The criminal didn\'t leave behind any trace of his crime.
这篇文章记叙了他的先进事迹。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngjìxù le tā de xiānjìn shìjì。
The article tells about his exemplary deeds.
迹近剽窃
jī jìn piāoqiè 
an act verging on plagiarism
这是一种不寻常的迹象。
Zhè shì yì zhǒng bùxúncháng de jì xiàng。
This is an unusual sign.
有迹象表明两国将改善关系。
Yǒu jì xiàng biǎomíngliǎngguó jiānggǎishàn guānjì。
There are indications that the two countries are going to improve their relations.
蜕变径迹
tuìbiàn jìnɡjì
decay track
径迹起点
jìnɡjì qǐdiǎn
track origin
字迹娟秀
zìjì juānxiù
beautiful handwriting; a graceful hand
猛犸在史前时期就绝迹了。
Něngmǎ zài shǐqián shíqī jiù juéjì le。
Mammoths became extinct in prehistoric times.
可歌可泣的英雄事迹
kěgēkěqì de yīngxióngshìjì
heroic and moving deeds
他发现一个形迹可疑的人向屋内窥视。
Tā fāxiàn yígè xíngjì kěyí de rén xiàng wū nèi kuīshì。
He spotted a suspicious character peeping into the house.
浪迹江湖
lànɡjì jiānɡhú

浪迹天涯

Zìjì liáocǎo。

búluòhénjì

这真是名副其实的奇迹。
Zhè zhēn shì míngfùqíshí de qíjì。
That\'s a veritable miracle.
名人墨迹
mínɡrén mòjì
original work by a famous calligrapher or painter
明心迹
mínɡ xīnjì

字迹模糊了。
Zìjì móhu le。
The writing was blurred.
他衬衫上有墨迹。
Tā chènshān shàngyǒu mòjì。
There were ink stains on his shirt.
这是鲁迅的墨迹。
Zhè shì Lǔxùn de mòjì。
This is Lu Xun\'s calligraphy.
协议墨迹未干，他们就把它撕毁了。
Xiéyì mòjì wèi gān，tāmen jiù bǎ tā sīhuǐ le。
They tore up the agreement before the ink was hardly dry.

Niándài jiǔ le，shíbēi shàng de zìjì yǐjing móhu le。
The inscriptions on the stone tablet have become blurred with the passage of time.
盘诘行迹可疑的人
pánjié xíngjì kěyí de rén

字迹清楚
zìjì qīngchu

汽油能去油迹。
Qìyóu néng qù yóujì。
Gas is good for taking out oil stains.
我在这原始森林里走了三天三夜，不见人迹。
Wǒ zài zhè yuánshǐ sēnlín lǐ zǒu le sāntiān sān yè，bújiàn rénjì。
I walked in the primeval forest for three days and nights without seeing any traces of human presence.

此人行迹诡秘，定非善类。

shēngpíng shìjì

Zhè fēngxìn zìjì tài liáocǎo，xiàng tiānshū shì de。
This letter is as illegible as hieroglyphics.
历史上未曾有过的奇迹
lìshǐ shàngwèicéngyǒuguo de qíjì 
a miracle unprecedented in history
衣服上的这块墨迹洗不掉。
Yīfu shàng de zhèkuài mòjì xǐ budiào。
I can\'t get rid of this ink stain on my coat. or This ink stain didn\'t wash out.
这位大明星近来销声匿迹，不知去向。
Zhèwèi dà míngxīngjìnlái xiāoshēngnìjì，bùzhī qù xiàng。
The renowned film star has of late disappeared from the scene and is nowhere to be found.
表明心迹
biǎomínɡ xīnjì

búlùxíngjì

不拘形迹
bù jū xínɡjì
without formality; not standing on ceremony
你进大楼时看到什么形迹可疑的人没有？
Nǐ jìn dàlóu shí kàndào shénme xíngjì kěyí de rén méiyǒu?
Did you notice anyone suspicious-looking when you came into the building?
警犬嗅来嗅去，终于找到了踪迹。
Jǐngquǎn xiùlái xiùqù，zhōng yú zhǎodào le zōngjì。
The police dog scented about till he found the trail.
殷红的血迹
yānhóng de xuèjì

杳无踪迹
yǎowúzōngjì

《北京名胜古迹一览》
《Běijīng Míngshèng Gǔjì Yìlǎn》
A Guide to the Historical Relics and Scenic Spots of Beijing
古代村落的遗迹
gǔdài cūnluò de yíjì

Yóuyú dìzhǐ zìjì bùqīng，zhìshǐ xìnjiàn wúfǎ tóudì。
It is impossible to deliver this letter because the address is illegible.
此案有蛛丝马迹可寻。
Cǐ àn yǒu zhūsīmǎjì kě xún。
There are clues for solving the case.
字迹模糊
zìjì móhu 
illegible handwriting
他不见了，未留下任何踪迹。
Tā bújiàn le，wèi liúxià rènhé zōngjì。

雪地上的足迹
xuědì shàng de zújì 
footprints (or tracks) in the snow
足迹
zújì
footmark; footprint; track
遗迹
yíjì
historical remains; traces; vestiges
小王的先进事迹都上了电视了。
Xiǎowáng de xiānjìn shìjì dōu shàng le diànshì le。
Xiao Wang\'s model deeds have been reported on TV.
她肺部的癌肿奇迹般地消失了。
Tā fèibù de áizhǒng qíjì bān de xiāoshī le。
The lung cancer has miraculously vanished.
那场见义勇为事迹报告会挺感人。
Nà chǎng jiànyìyǒngwéi shìjì bàogàohuì tǐng gǎnrén。
That public lecture on heroic deeds was very moving.
我们一定要为您见义勇为的事迹报功。
Wǒmen yídìng yào wèi nín jiànyìyǒngwéi de shìjì bàogōng。
We will definitely report your heroic deed to a higher authority.
他打算一退休就屏迹乡里。
Tā dǎsuàn yí tuìxiū jiù píngjì xiānglǐ。
He decided to live a secluded life after retirement.
他功成身退，已经屏迹于世。
Tā gōngchéng shēntuì，yǐjing píngjì yú shì。
He retired from public life, and lived in seclusion.
他的光荣事迹远近播扬，足以感染一个时代。
Tā de guāngróng shìjì yuǎnjìn bōyáng，zúyǐ gǎnrǎn yígè shídài。
His glorious stories were widely spread, and touched a whole generation.
地面上有一片惨红的血迹。
Dìmiàn shàng yǒu yípiàn cǎnhóng de xuèjì。
There is some rufous blood on the floor.
杜甫草堂是成都最著名的古迹之一。
Dù Fǔ cǎotáng shì Chéngdūu zuì zhùmíng de gǔjì zhīyī。
Du Fu\'s thatched cottage is one of the most famous relics in Chengdu.
这些石头有着明显的被水冲蚀的痕迹。
Zhèxiē shítou yǒu zhe míngxiǎn de bèi shuǐ chōngshí de hénjì。
These stones have obvious marks of water erosion.
传说中他是个世外高人，已经遁迹山林好多年了。
Chuánshuō zhōng tā shì gè shìwàigāorén，yǐjing dùnjì shānlín hǎoduōnián le。
It is said that he had lived in seclusion for many years.
敦煌的古烽燧遗迹，诉说着历史的沧桑。
Dūnhuáng de gǔfēngsuì yíjì，sùshuō zhe lìshǐ de cāngsāng。
The ancient beacon fire and smoke relics tell people about the changes of time.
这部电视剧斧凿的痕迹过于明显。
Zhèbù diànshìjù fǔzáo de hénjì guòyú míngxiǎn。
The TV series looks artificial.
他的刀法真是好，改刀都不露痕迹。
Tā de dāofǎ zhēnshì hǎo，gǎidāo dōu búlòu hénjì。
He is so skillful in using a carving knife that there is no possibility of improvement.
他的事迹真令人感佩！
Tā de shìjì zhēn lìngrén gǎnpèi！
His story is appreciated and admired by us.
他是卧底，混迹在流氓团体中，获取了许多犯罪证据。
Tā shì wòdǐ，hùnjì zài liúmáng tuántǐ zhōng，huòqǔ le xǔduō fànzuì zhèngjù。
He is a planted agent, hiding his identity to the gangsters, and getting a lot of criminal evidence.
此事甚奇，迹象全无，想必是因缘际会，造化弄人。
Cǐshì shènqí，jì xiàng quánwú，xiǎngbì shì yīnyuán jìhuì，zàohuà nòngrén。
It is very strange that no trace can be found. I guess it must be predestinated, we are the sport of faith.
几乎全省重要家祠都留有他雕凿的痕迹。
Hīhū quánshěng zhòngyào jiācí dōu liúyǒu tā diāozáo de hénjì。
Almost all the major family halls in the province hold his  carving works.
雪地上留下不少动物脚爪的痕迹。
Xuědìshàng liúxià bùshǎo dòngwù jiǎozhuǎ de hénjì。
There are many footprints of animals in the snow.
他乐于助人的事迹令人敬服。
Tā lèyú zhùrén de shìjì lìngrén jìngfú。
Always ready to help others, he wins everyone\'s respect.
这是古长城的旧迹，现在很少有人去爬了。
Zhè shì gǔ Chángchéng de jiùjì，xiànzài hěnshǎo yǒurén qù pá le。
This is the remains of the ancient Great Wall, rarely visited by tourists anymore.
苏东坡的旧迹价值连城，被很多人高价收藏。
Sū Dōngpō de jiùjì jiàzhí liánchéng，bèi hěnduōrén gāojià shōucáng。
Su Dongpo\'s writings and paintings are of great value, and collected by many at very high prices.
那里在古时候曾经是军屯驻地，至今我们还能看到一些相关的遗迹。
Nàlǐ zài gǔshíhou céngjīng shì jūntún zhùdì，zhìjīn wǒmen hái néng kàndào yìxiē xiāngguān de yíjì。
That place used to be a military station in ancient times. We can still see some remains of it now.
长城被列为了世界八大奇迹之一。
Chángchéng bèi lièwéi le shìjiè bādà qíjì zhīyī。
The Great Wall is listed as one of the Eight Wonders of the World.
这座木塔临江而建，是著名的古迹。
Zhèzuò mùtǎ línjiāng ér jiàn，shì zhùmíng de gǔjì。
The wood tower was built facing the river. It was a famous historic site.
书信上的字迹已经漫冹，很难辨认了。
Shūxìn shàng de zìjì yǐjing mànfǎ，hěnnán biànrèn le。
The characters on the letter have blurred, and are hard to recognize.
纸上的字迹矇矇不清，很难辨认。
Zhǐ shàng de zìjì méngméng bùqīng，hěnnán biànrèn。
The handwriting on the paper is obscure and hard to understand.
这封信是密写的，要经过特殊处理才能看到字迹。
Zhè fēng xìn shì mìxiě de，yào jīngguò tèshū chǔlǐ cáinéng kàndào zìjì。
This letter was written in invisible ink, and could only be seen by a special process.
岳飞做为宋代名将，他的英雄事迹名垂千古。
Yuè Fēi zuòwéi Sòngdài míngjiàng，tā de yīngxióng shìjì míngchuíqiāngǔ。
As a famous Song dynasty general, the heroic deeds of Yuefei are immortalized.
在福建泉州，至今还能看到古代摩尼教遗迹呢！
Zài Fújiàn Quánzhōu，zhìjīn hái néng kàndào gǔdài móníjiào yíjì ne！
In Quanzhou Fujian Province, relics of ancient Manichaeism still can be seen.
古时候，受了墨刑的人一辈子也洗不掉脸上那犯罪的“痕迹”。
Gǔshíhou，shòu le mòxíng de rén yíbèizi yě xǐbúdiào liǎnshàng nà fànzuì de“hénjì”。
In ancient times, people were punished by having their faces tattooed.
车祸事故现场有一地血迹和脑浆子，真是恶心。
Chēhuò shìgù xiànchǎng yǒu yídì xuèjì hé nǎojiāngzi，zhēnshì ěxīn。
The scene of the traffic accident is covered with blood and brains, which is extremely disgusting.
他匿迹潜形了几年，我们谁都没有关于他的消息。
Tā nìjì qiánxíng le jǐ nián，wǒmen shéi dōu méiyǒu guānyú tā de xiāoxi。
He has disappeared for several years, none of us have heard of him.
他杀人之后就逃跑了，从此隐迹潜踪。
Tā shārén zhīhòu jiù táopǎo le，cóngcǐ yǐnjì qiánzōng。
He escaped after committing a murder, and went into hiding afterwards.
这个城市里保留着不少儒教的古迹。
Zhège chéngshì lǐ bǎoliú zhe bùshǎo rújiào de gǔjì。
The city still has a lot of Confucian historic sites.
事故现场的地面上几天以后还留有深红色的血迹。
Shìgù xiànchǎng de dìmiàn shàng jǐtiān yǐhòu hái liúyǒu shēn hóngsè de xuèjì。
Dark red blood could still be seen on the floor of the accident site a few days later.
我国经济已经出现了通货紧缩的迹象，必须及时加以控制。
Wǒ guó jīngjì yǐjing chūxiàn le tōnghuò jǐnsuō de jì xiàng，bìxū jíshí jiāyǐ kòngzhì。
The economy is showing signs of deflation, which should be curbed in time.
从图记便可以看出这幅画不是唐寅的真迹。
Cóng tújì biàn kěyǐ kànchū zhèfúhuà búshì Táng Yín de zhēnjì。
The seal reveals that this painting is not an authentic work of Tang Yin.
这纤秀的字迹一看就知道不是你写的。
Zhè xiānxiù de zìjì yíkàn jiù zhīdào búshì nǐ xiě de。
Such slender and elegant hand writing can never be yours.
今天是怎么了？大街上人迹萧然。
Jīntiān shì zěnme le？Dàjiē shàng rénjì xiāorán。
What is happening today? The street is almost empty.
叔叔一向行迹不定，你很难找到他。
Shūshu yí xiàng xíngjì búdìng，nǐ hěn nán zhǎodào tā。
Uncle has no fixed whereabouts. It will be difficult for you to find him.
证券市场最近有些虚热的迹象。
Zhèngquàn shìchǎng zuìjìn yǒuxiē xūrè de jì xiàng。
The security market shows some trace of the bubble.
这封信有好几处影写的痕迹，应该不是他本人写的。
Zhèfēngxìn yǒu hǎojǐchù yǐngxiě de hénjì，yīnggāi búshì tā běnrén xiě de。
There are several apographs in this letter; he couldn\'t have written it.
窗外的雨声越来越大了，一点停的迹象都没有。
Chuāngwài de yǔshēng yuèláiyuèdà le，yìdiǎn tíng de jìxiàng dōu méiyǒu。
The sound of the rain outside the window is becoming louder and there is no sign indicating it will stop.
下岗女工给失学儿童赠款的事迹感动了很多人。
Xiàgǎng nǚgōng gěi shīxué értóng zèngkuǎn de shìjì gǎndòng le hěnduō rén。
Many people are moved by the laid-off woman worker who presented money to children who had to dropout of school.
长城是世界最伟大的建筑奇迹之一。
Chángchéng shì shìjiè zuì wěidà de jiànzhù qíjì zhīyī。
The Great Wall is one of the greatest wonders of the world.

Tāmen dēngshàng le zhūfēng，chuàngzào le qíjì。

rèn bǐjì

笔迹
bǐjì
writing
误认为他的笔迹。
他的笔迹好认。
核对笔迹。
这是不是他的笔迹，我不能确定。
The handwriting checks with the signature on the check.
Bǐjì yǔ zhīpiào shàng de qiānmíng bǐjì xiāngtóng。
笔迹与支票上的签名笔迹相同。
crab handwriting
难辨认的笔迹
indelible ink
笔迹难擦掉的墨水
Doctors\' handwriting has been the butt of jokes for many years.
Yīshēng de bǐjì duō nián lái yìzhí shì rénmen de xiàobǐng。
医生的笔迹多年来一直是人们的笑柄。
My handwriting was the despair of my teachers.
Wǒ de bǐjì lìng wǒ de lǎoshī juéwàng。
我的笔迹令我的老师绝望。
The handwriting on the note was simply awful.
Biàntiáo shàng de bǐjì tài liǎocǎo le。
便条上的笔迹太潦草了。
He turned the paper over so the writing wouldn\'t show.
Tā bǎ zhǐ fānzhuǎn guòlái，suǒyǐ jiù kànbúdào bǐjì le。
他把纸翻转过来，所以就看不到笔迹了。
She recognized his handwriting.
Tā rènchūle tā de bǐjì。
她认出了他的笔迹。
We could nohow make out his handwriting.
Wǒmen wúfǎ biànrèn chū tā de bǐjì。
我们无法辨认出他的笔迹。
The dullness of the pencil made his writing illegible.
Cūdùn de qiānbǐ ràng tā de zìjì nányǐ biànrèn。
粗钝的铅笔让他的字迹难以辨认。

银行汇票由银行担保，风险低。

Zhème dà de shìqing，nǐ zuìhǎo huìbào dào Chéngguān Zhèn zhèngfǔ qù。
You\'d better report great events like this to the government.
创汇率的计算方法是很复杂的。
Chuànghuìlǜ de jìsuàn fāngfǎ shì hěn fùzá de。
The calculation method for foreign exchange earned through exporting is very complicated.
近几个月，美元对日元的汇率一直低走。
Jìn jǐgè yuè，měiyuán duì rìyuán de huìlǜ yìzhí dīzǒu。
The exchange rate of the dollar to the yen has continued to drop in recent months.
他在密切关注人民币兑美元的浮动汇率。
Tā zài mìqiè guānzhù rénmínbì duì měiyuán de fúdòng huìlǜ。
He pays close attention to the floating exchange rate of the RMB.
这座大型市场汇聚了各地的货物。
Zhèzuò dàxíng shìchǎng huìjù le gè dì de huòwù。
Commodities from all places are gathered in this large market.
他去汇市兑换美元，结果走错了地方。
Tā qù huìshì duìhuàn měiyuán，jiéguǒ zǒucuò le dìfāng。
He wanted to change some dollars at the Money Exchange, but went to the wrong place.
经济学家分析了近期的汇市，认为大盘近期会有很大涨幅。
Jīngjìxuéjiā fēnxī le jìnqī de huìshì，rènwéi dàpán jìnqī huì yǒu hěndà zhǎngfú。
Economists have analyzed the latest quotations on the exchange market, they think that popular shares will have a great rise in price.
请你收好这张汇水单以便日后查对。
Qǐng nǐ shōuhǎo zhèzhāng huìshuǐdān yǐbiàn rìhòu cháduì。
Please put away this remittance bill in case you want to check it in the future.
少数民族艺术家们在人民大会堂进行了汇演。
Shǎoshù mínzú yìshùjiāmen zài rénmín dàhuìtáng jìnxíng le huìyǎn。
Artists from minor nationalities gave a joint performance in the People\'s Hall.
在六一儿童节时，电影频道汇映了许多卡通影片。
Zài liùyī értóngjié shí，diànyǐng píndào huìyìng le xǔduō kǎtōng yǐngpiàn。
During Children\'s Day, the movie channel broadcast a show of many cartoon films.
百幅名画在北京历史博物馆汇展。
Bǎi fú mínghuà zài Bĕijīng lìshǐ bówùguǎn huìzhǎn.
Hundreds of famous paintings are exhibited together in the Museum of History in Beijing.
很多人写文章喜欢用些简古的词汇，让人看不明白什么意思。
Hěnduōrén xiě wénzhāng xǐhuan yòng xiē jiǎngǔ de cíhuì，ràng rén kàn bùmíngbai shénme yìsi。
Some people like to use obscure words in their essay, which make them barely comprehensible.
这种词汇多见于古文中，现代汉语已经很少用了。
Zhèzhǒng cíhuì duōjiànyú gǔwén zhōng，xiàndài hànyǔ yǐjīng hěn shǎo yòng le。
These words do not usually appear in modern Chinese; they are more likely seen in ancient articles.
由于冷暖空气交汇，未来几天，我市以阴雨天气为主。
Yóuyú lěngnuǎn kōngqì jiāohuì，wèilái jǐ tiān，wǒ shì yǐ yīnyǔ tiānqì wéizhǔ。
In the sky over our city, the cold front meets the warm front, which will bring about rainy weather over the next few days.
两条平行线是不会有交汇点的。
Liǎng tiáo píngxíngxiàn shì búhuì yǒu jiāohuìdiǎn de。
There is no converging point of two parallel lines.
我们会把大家汇报的问题接转给有关部门。
Wǒmen huì bǎ dàjiā huìbào de wèntí jiēzhuǎn gěi yǒuguān bùmén。
We will submit the problems you have reported to the departments concerned.
我要去银行办理结汇。
Wǒ yào qù yínháng bànlǐ jiéhuì。
I am going to the bank to settle the exchange.
炼狱是个宗教词汇，是洗脱人罪过的地方。
Liànyù shì gè zōngjiào cíhuì，shì xǐtuō rén zuìguò de dìfāng。
Purgatory is a religious word which is a place for people to wash away their sins.
江涛渺渺，不知何时才能汇入大海。
Jiāngtāo miǎomiǎo，bùzhī héshí cáinéng huìrù dàhǎi。
The river extends boundless, and it will take a long time to join into the sea.
这部书融汇着许多学者的智慧思想。
Zhèbù shū rónghuì zhe xǔduō xuézhě dìzhìhuì sīxiǎng。
The book collects the wisdom and thoughts of many scholars.
山上的雨水全都汇集流进了山洼里。
Shān shàng de yǔshuǐ quándōu huìjí liújìn le shānwā lǐ。
Rainwater on the mountain flows into the valley.
每一条大河都是由无数的汀滢汇聚而成的。
Měi yìtiáo dàhé dōushì yóu wúshù de tīngyíng huìjù ér chéng de。
Countless small streams converge to form a large river.
他向我汇报了头天会议的主要内容。
Tā xiàng wǒ huìbào le tóutiān huìyì de zhǔyàonèiróng。
He reported to me the main content of yesterday\'s meeting.
现在这种外汇券已经不流通了。
Xiànzài zhèzhǒng wàihuìquàn yǐjing bùliútōng le。
This foreign exchange certificate in not in circulation now.
“物化劳动”是经济学领域的一个新词汇。
“Wùhuà láodòng”shì jīngjìxué lǐngyù de yígè xīncíhuì。
&quot;Materialized labour&quot; is a new economic term.
香港元与人民币之间的汇率一直比较稳定。
Xiānggǎngyuán yǔ rénmínbì zhījiān de huìlǜ yìzhí bǐjiào wěndìng。
The exchange rate between the Hong Kong dollar and the RMB is very stable.
不要总是到领导那里打同事的小汇报。
Búyào zǒngshì dào lǐngdǎo nàlǐ dǎ tóngshì de xiǎohuìbào。
Don\'t inform on your colleagues to the superior all the time.
这件事非同小可，必须赶快向领导汇报。
Zhèjiànshì fēitóng xiǎokě，bìxū gǎnkuài xiàng lǐngdǎo huìbào。
This is not a trivial thing, you have to report it to your boss immediately.
扩大词汇的蓄积量，有利于提高口语。
Kuòdà cíhuì de xùjīliàng，yǒulìyú tígāo kǒuyǔ。
Enlarging your vocabulary can help you improve your oral English.
文人汇聚，雅言不绝于耳，我真是三生有幸。
Wénrén huìjù，yǎyán bùjué yúěr，wǒ zhēnshì sānshēng yǒuxìng。
I am so happy to participate in refined conversations between men of letters.
央行对人民币的汇率做了进一步的整固。
Yāngháng duì rénmínbì de huìlǜ zuò le jìnyíbù de zhěnggù。
The Central Bank further adjusted and stablized the exchange rate of the RMB.
我们还是逐级汇报此事比较稳妥。
Wǒmen háishi zhújí huìbào cǐshì bǐjiào wěntuǒ。
It is advisable for us to report this matter rank by rank.
这些基本词汇连孩子都会使用。
Zhèxiē jīběn cíhuì lián háizi dōuhuì shǐyòng。
Even children know how to use basic vocabulary.
我国的外汇储备量正在逐年增加。
Wǒguó de wàihuì chǔbèiliàng zhèngzài zhúnián zēngjiā。
The foreign-exchange reserves in our country are increasing year by year.
把外汇换算成人民币
bǎ wàihuì huànsuànchéng rénmínbì
convert foreign currency into Renminbi

Rénqún huìjídào guǎngchǎng shàng.
A crowd gathered on the square.

Xǔduō yīngyǔ cíhuì shì lādīngwén de pàishēng.
Many English words are derived from Latin.

老舍作品的北京话语汇很丰富。
月初汇报上个月的生产情况。
万千溪流总汇成滔滔大江。

an exchange broker
外汇经纪人，汇兑掮客

承兑汇票是国际贸易中交换汇票的更现代的形式。

The dollar has made a large movement this week, falling to a new low against the euro.
和欧元正相反，本周美元汇率有很大波动，达到新低。
The Mississippi River joins the Minnesota River 13km downstream from St.Anthony Falls.
密西西比河在距圣安东尼瀑布十三公里处与明尼苏达河交汇。
In 1982, the Mexican peso hit an all time low against the US dollar.
1982年，墨西哥比索对美元汇率跌至历史最低值。
Words change meaning  without our noticing.
不经意间，词汇的意义已经发生了变化。
You turn left where the alley meets the avenue.
你在小巷和大街交汇的地方左转。

政府会允许汇率浮动吗？

他们会测试我正在学的词汇吗？

如有疑问或要求，请向主席汇报。
Payment can be in the form of a personal check, bank draft or money order.
可以用过个人支票或银行汇票进行支付。

如果想查找文中所用词汇的参考信息，双击即可。

只有几个地方你能取钱，但是汇率方面会很吃亏。
bill of exchange

这些地方对换汇收取极高的手续费。

Your wire transfer can be received at any bank in the city.

银行汇票由银行担保，风险低。
Contrary to our expectation, the exchange rate of RMB increased.
和我们预想的不同，人民币的汇率增加了。
Lee asked his sister to transfer some money to him.
李让妹妹给自己汇些钱。
You should use upbeat or happy words.
你应该使用积极向上、活泼快乐的词汇。
Water-drops gathered together and become a puddle.
水滴汇集起来形成了一滩积水。

这家银行的电汇服务最好。

我昨天收到了妈妈给我的汇款。

我收到了一张五十美元的汇票。

这批货物必须用保兑的，不可撤消的即期汇票信用证支付。

高汇率会影响出口。

我希望你能及时把钱汇给我。

地级政府通常向省级政府汇报。
The exchange rate policy was highly damaging to manufacturing.
Huìlǜzhèngcè jídà de sǔnhàile zhìzàoyè。

Tā lìjí jiāng xuǎnjǔ jiéguǒ huìbào gěi tā de shàngjí。
他立即将选举结果汇报给他的上级。

Quánzì shíbié jìshù jǐnnéng yòngyú cíhuì shòuxiàn de yǒuxiàoyù。
全字识别技术仅能用于词汇受限的有效域。

重音符在西班牙语中用来改变词汇的重音。

Tā xiàng huìjí zài lǐtáng lǐ de“fěnsīmen”jiǎnglehuà。

在许多语言中，词汇的形式因呼应、格、时态等因素而发生变化。

Zài Zhōngguó gǔdài，chéngqiānshàngwàn de qiángdào jīngcháng huìjí zài yìqǐ qiǎngjié cūnzhuāng。

词汇
cíhuì
vocabulary; words and phrases

cíhuì
vocabulary

technical vocabulary
专门词汇；术语

不经意间，词汇的意义已经发生了变化。

你应该使用积极向上、活泼快乐的词汇。

“Bat\'、“bea\'、“bit\'、“boat\'、“boot\' děng Yīngyǔ cíhuì zhōng de yuányīn shì cháng yuányīn。
“bate”、“beat”、“bite”、“boat”、“boot”等英语词汇中的元音是长元音。

“Pat\'、“pet\'、“pit\'、“pot\' 、“putt\' děng Yīngyǔ cíhuì zhōng de yuányīn shì duǎn yuányīn。
“pat”、“pet”、“pit”、“pot”、“putt”等英语词汇中的元音是短元音。

zhànwěn jiǎogēn 
get a firm foothold; stand firm

稳当的办法
wěndang de bànfǎ 
a reliable method

&quot;稳&quot;字当头，从不冒险

价格有可能会出现伴有慢速增长的相对平稳，或者不出现任何增长。
John spends his life trying to keep George on an even keel.
Yuēhàn zhè yíbèizi dōu zài nǔlì ràng Qiáozhì guòshàng wěndìng de shēnghuó。
约翰这一辈子都在努力让乔治过上稳定的生活。
Yet he\'s managed to keep his feet firmly planted on the ground.
Dànshì tā yǐ shèfǎ zhànwěn le。
但是他已设法站稳了。
The family was kept in limbo.
Gāi jiātíng bìng bù wěndìng。
该家庭并不稳定。
They were in a state of steady motion.
Tāmen chǔyú héng wěn yùndòng zhuàngtài zhōng。
它们处于恒稳运动状态中。
He smoothely released the clutch with one foot and stepped on the gas with the other.
Tā yì zhī jiǎo píngwěn de sōngkāi líhéqì，lìng yì zhī jiǎo cǎi zhù yóumén。
他一只脚平稳地松开离合器，另一只脚踩住油门。
He walked with unsteady steps.
Tā zǒulù bù wěn。
他走路不稳。
It was built on a base of solid rock.
Tā jiàn zài yí kuài wěngù de yáncéng shàng。
它建在一块稳固的岩层上。
The horse trotted along at a steady pace.
Mǎ wěnbù xiǎopǎo qiánjìn。
马稳步小跑前进。
Prices remained flat.
Jiàgé píngwěn。
价格平稳。
The economy is stable.
Jīngjì fēicháng wěndìng。
经济非常稳定。
Her place in literature is secure.
Tā zài wénxuéjiè de dìwèi shì wěngù de。
她在文学界的地位是稳固的。
The economy stabilized.
Jīngjì wěndìng le。
经济稳定了。
The player juggled the ball.
Zhè míng qiúyuán méi jiē wěn qiú。
这名球员没接稳球。
The drug stabilized her blood pressure.
Zhè zhǒng yàopǐn wěndìngle tā de xuèyā。
这种药品稳定了她的血压。
The reason a steady state was never reached was that the back pressure built up too slowly.
Cóngwèi dádào wěntài de yuányīn shì bèiyā jījù tài màn。
从未达到稳态的原因是背压积聚太慢。
The consumption of energy has increased steadily.
Néngyuán de xiāofèiliàng zài wěnbù zēngzhǎng。
能源的消费量在稳步增长。
He forged ahead.
Tā wěnbùqiánjìn。
他稳步前进。
Can\'t you carry me decent?
Nǐ bēi wǒ de shíhou bùnéng wěntuǒ yìdiǎn ma？
你背我的时候不能稳妥一点吗？
The experiment demonstrated the instability of the compound.
Shíyàn zhèngmíngle zhè zhǒng hùnhéwù de bù wěndìngxìng。
实验证明了这种混合物的不稳定性。
The weather system of the pacific is determined by the uninterrupted smoothness of the ocean.
Tàipíngyáng de tiānqì xìtǒng shì yóu hǎiyáng biǎomiàn shìfǒu píngwěn juédìng de。
太平洋的天气系统是由海洋表面是否平稳决定的。
The team\'s continued success is attributable to a steady infusion of new talent.
Nà zhī duìwu de chíxù chénggōng guīyīn yú xīn réncái de wěndìng shūrù。
那支队伍的持续成功归因于新人才的稳定输入。
The company is looking for stability after years of musical chairs with directors.

由于电子污染，我的手机信号不是很稳定。

The price of mineral oil is not stable.
一定要保证蚕室的温度稳定，不能太高也不能太低。
Yídìng yào bǎozhèng cánshì de wēndù wěndìng，bùnéng tài gāo yě bùnéng tài dī。
The tempreture in a silkworm rooms should be kept stable, neither too high or too low.
他撇下稳定的工作不干，却偏要去做那投机生意。
Tā piěxià wěndìng de gōngzuò búgàn，què piānyào qù zuò nà tóujī shēngyì。
He cast aside his steady job and engaged in speculation.
不要以为进了一个稳定的单位就等于进了保险箱。
Búyào yǐwéi jìn le yígè wěndìng de dānwèi jiù děngyú jìn le bǎoxiǎnxiāng。
Don\'t ever believe that everything will be fine, just because you are employed by a financially stable company.
The situation was too fluid and the future was too uncertain.
Qíngkuàng tài bù wěndìng，wèilái tài bú quèdìng。
情况太不稳定，未来太不确定。
labile chemical compounds
不稳定化合物
a volatile social condition
不稳定的社会情况
Our budget shrunk because of the instable situation.
因为局势的不稳定，我们的预算缩减。
We had better not trade stock anymore, the market is very volatile now.
我们最好不要买卖股票了，市场现在非常不稳定。
Even the most dismal and unstable circumstances can become something to be clung to.
Jíshǐ zuì qīcǎn hé bù wěndìng de qíngkuàng yīrán kěyǐ chéngwéi zhídé jiānchí de qíngkuàng。
即使最凄惨和不稳定的情况依然可以成为值得坚持的情况。
Her mother, mentally unstable, eventually entered an  asylum  in 1885.
Tā de jīngshen bù wěndìng de mǔqīn zài 1885 nián zuìzhōng jìnlái yì jiā jīngshénbìngyuàn。
她的精神不稳定的母亲在1885年最终进来一家精神病院。
A loaded revolver flying through the air brings extra instability into an already volatile situation.

His wife has uncertain health, could she manage life in London?
Tā de qīzi shēntǐ zhuàngkuàng bù wěndìng，tā zài Lúndūn kěyǐ dúzì yìngduì shēnghuó ma？
他的妻子身体状况不稳定，她在伦敦可以独自应对生活吗？
The price of volatile stocks will fluctuate.

Gāi jiātíng bìng bù wěndìng。
该家庭并不稳定。

Everything was unstable following the coup.

政变之后，形势很不稳定。
The economy destabilized rapidly.
Jīngjì hěn kuài jiù bù wěndìng le。

A part of the answer must be to reduce the instability of financial markets.
dá\'àn kěndìng bāokuò jiàngdī Jīnróngshìchǎng de bù wěndìngxìng。

He could no longer stand firm on his feet.
Tā bùfá búzài wěndìng yǒulì。
他步伐不再稳定有力。

He could never hold down a regular job.
他从来都保不住一份稳定的工作。
Peace and stability cannot be guaranteed by force.
Hépíng wěndìng bùnéng yǐ wǔlì zuòwéi dānbǎo。
和平稳定不能以武力作为担保。
We can never have completely assured lives.
Wǒmen bùkěnéng yǒu wánquán ānwěn quèdìng de shēnghuó。
我们不可能有完全安稳确定的生活。
这个地区一向不稳定，两个国家动不动就武力相向。
Zhège dìqū yí xiàng bùwěndìng，liǎng gè guójiā dòngbudòng jiù wǔlì xiāng xiàng。
This area is never stable, having two countries which constantly fight against each other.
前脚一滑，后脚也站不稳。
Qián jiǎo yì huá，hòujiǎo yě zhàn bùwěn。
As the front foot slipped, the rear foot became unsteady.
我前脚一滑，身体站不稳，就摔了。
Wǒ qiánjiǎo yì huá，shēntǐ zhàn bùwěn，jiù shuāi le。
As soon as my front foot slipped, I lost my balance and fell over.
这座桥看来很不稳，行人都望而却步。
Zhèzuò qiáo kànlái hěn bùwěn，xíngrén dōu wàng\'érquèbù。
The bridge looked so unsafe that the travellers all hung back in fear.
这艘船船底吃水很浅，所以有些不稳。
Zhèsōuchuán chuándǐ chīshuǐ hěnqiǎn，suǒyǐ yǒuxiē bùwěn。
The bottom of the ship is drawing a little water, so it is not sailing smoothly.
现在的股票市场不稳定，投资者都很小心谨慎。
Xiànzài de gǔpiào shìchǎng bùwěndìng，tóuzīzhě dōu hěnxiǎoxīn jǐnshèn。
The stock markets are going wild and the investors are being prudent.
这只鸡雏刚出生没多久，走路还不稳当呢。
Zhèzhī jīchú gāng chūshēng méi duōjiǔ，zǒulù hái bùwěndāng ne。
This chick was born not long ago, and is not even able to walk steadily.
股市不稳，很多股民开始减仓。
Gǔshì bùwĕn，hĕn duō gǔmín kāishǐ jiǎncāng.
The stock market is becoming volatile, so many shareholders begin to sell shares.
他做事情毛头毛脑的，一点也不稳重。
Tā zuòshìqing máotóu máonǎo de，yìdiǎn yě bùwěnzhòng。
He works imprudently and obtrusively, and is never a stable man.
本周的期货市场，因为有人恶意抛盘而显得震荡不稳。
Běnzhōu de qīhuò shìchǎng，yīnwèiyǒurén èyì pāopán ér xiǎnde zhèndàng bùwěn。
This week\'s option market seemed to have fluctuated because somebody was selling maliciously.
她举止飘浮，很不稳重。
Tā jǔzhǐ piāofú，hěnbùwěnzhòng。
She behaves frivolously, she is not at all sedate.
猴市不稳定，你还是看看再行动吧。
Hóushì bù wěndìng，nǐ háishì kànkàn zài xíngdòng bā。
这孩子受了惊吓，睡得不安稳。
Zhè háizi shòu le jīngxià，shuì de bùānwěn。
The child has had a shock and isn\'t sleeping well.
他的学习成绩凑凑合合，也不太稳定。
Tā de xuéxí chéngjì còucòuhéhé，yě bú tài wěndìng。
His study is not bad, but not very consistent.
刚做完开颅手术的他，颅内压不太稳定。
Gāng zuòwán kāilú shǒushù de tā，lúnèiyā bú tài wěndìng。
Just after a having a craniotomy, his intracranial pressure is not stable.
从描记中可以看出，这里的通讯信号不太稳定。

From the linear graph, the communication signal is not stable here.
由于电子污染，我的手机信号不是很稳定。

My cell phone can\'t receive stable electronic signals because of  electronic pollution.

The price of mineral oil is not stable.
他无论做什么事总是非常稳重，不急躁，的确很有修养。
Tā wúlùn zuò shénme shì zǒngshì fēichángwěnzhòng，bùjízào，díquè hěn yǒu xiūyǎng。
He is always steady and reliable in whatever he does. He is really self-possessed.
一定要保证蚕室的温度稳定，不能太高也不能太低。

The tempreture in a silkworm rooms should be kept stable, neither too high or too low.
压载后，船不摇晃了，稳了很多。
Yāzǎi hòu，chuán bùyáohuàng le，wěn le hěnduō。
After putting more weight on the ship, it stops shaking and becomes more stable.
你可真够笨的，小头朝上不就可以放稳了吗？
Nǐ kě zhēn gòu bèn de，xiǎotóu cháoshàng bú jiù kěyǐ fàngwěn le ma？
You are so stupid. Why don\'t you put the large end at the bottom to make it stable?
他撇下稳定的工作不干，却偏要去做那投机生意。

He cast aside his steady job and engaged in speculation.
他年纪不大，说话做事都很稳重。
Tā niánjì bú dà，shuōhuà zuòshì dōu hěn wěnzhòng。
Young as he is, he is steady in what he says and what he does.
不要以为进了一个稳定的单位就等于进了保险箱。

不要急，要想出一个更为稳便的办法才行。

好不容易等到河水落槽，抗洪战士们才能睡上个安稳觉了。

a deep valley; gorge

再向前就是深谷了，你们一定要加倍小心！

There is a deep valley ahead. You can\'t be too careful!

Standing on the mountain top, one can have a bird\'s eye view of the deep valley.

Two high mountains are standing up there, forming a huge natural canyon in the middle.

The army of the Tang Dynasty and the army of the Tu Guhun (a nation in ancient China) started a fierce battle.

This year we had a bumper grain harvest, which made my grandmother very happy.
人不能总吃细粮，吃点五谷杂粮也是有益健康的。

Men can not always eat flour and rice, it is good for health to eat some cereals.

在所以茶叶中，我最喜欢龙井茶的茶香。
Zài suǒyǐ cháyè zhōng，wǒ zuì xǐhuan lóngjǐngchá de cháxiāng。
I like the flavor of longjing tea best.

mǎi yìbǎi kè cháyè

The timing for picking tea leaves deserves careful study.
我每天早上起来都喜欢吃两个茶叶蛋。

I like eating two eggs after getting up in the morning.
这个特色商店主要经营茶叶食品。

This specialty shop mainly sells food with tea flavor.

The crimped tea leaves gradually unfold after hitting the hot water and are floating up and down in the cup.
品茶，就是借助于感觉来感知茶叶的品质高下。
Pǐnchá，jiùshì jièzhùyú gǎnjué lái gǎnzhī cháyè de pǐnzhì gāoxià。
Sipping tea and appraising its flavor and quality is to define the quality of the tea through personal feelings.
当下茶叶市场上把普洱炒得火热，不知是不是昙花一现？

开茶馆
kāi cháɡuǎn
run a teahouse

guānkàn huàjù《Cháguǎn》（wǔjù《Tiān\'éhú》）

茶道
chádào
tea ceremony

Tea made in a covered tea bowl tastes good.

这眼泉水味道醇甜，用它沏茶肯定很不错。
Zhè yǎn quánshuǐ wèidào chúntián，yòng tā qīchá kěndìng hěnbúcuò。
This spring water is pure and sweet, so it is good for making tea.
人们爱喝春茶，是喜欢那新鲜的味道。

Spring tea has a fresh taste and that is why people love to drink it.

照那样改动，面目全非，就不是原来的《茶馆》了。

她一面喝茶，一面用眼瞟他。
Tā yímiàn hēchá，yímiàn yòngyǎn piǎo tā。

Zhèzhǒng chá pǐnjí gāo。

His host brought him a cup of tea, and half rising from his seat, he said, &quot;Thank you.&quot;
这些茶具，我一套也瞧不上眼。

这个茶几的玻璃砖是耐高温的。
Zhège chájǐ de bōlizhuān shì nài gāowēn de。
The thick glass of this tea table can endure high temperatures.
这次去湖南旅游，我们特意去欣赏了当地有名的采茶戏。
Zhècì qù Húnán lǚyóu，wǒmen tèyì qù xīnshǎng le dāngdì yǒumíng de cǎicháxì。
We watched the famous caicha opera when we went to Hunan Province for sightseeing.
采择茶叶的时节是十分讲究的。
Cǎizé cháyè de shíjié shì shífēn jiǎngjiū de。
The timing for picking tea leaves deserves careful study.
忙完了蚕月，人们又该去山上采茶了。
Mángwán le cányuè，rénmen yòu gāi qù shān shàng cǎichá le。
After a busy March when people have to work the hardest feeding silkworms, they now have to go to mountains to pick tea.
他们第一次约会的地点就是这个小茶吧。
Tāmen dìyīcì yuēhuì de dìdiǎn jiùshì zhège xiǎochábā。
They had their first date in that small tea house..
他新买了一把茶炊。
Tā xīn mǎi le yìbǎ cháchuī。
He bought a new tea-urn.
桌子上的茶碟里放了很多花生和瓜子。
Zhuōzi shàng de chádié lǐ fàng le hěnduō huāshēng hé guāzǐ。
There are many peanuts, and melon seeds in the saucers on the table.
茶缸里的水已经凉了。
Chágāng lǐ de shuǐ yǐjing liáng le。
The water in the teacup has already cooled.
工厂门口经常有一个老汉卖茶鸡蛋。
Gōngchǎng ménkǒu jīngcháng yǒu yígè lǎohàn mài chájīdàn。
An elderly man is always selling boiled tea eggs in front of the factory gates.
由于光线太强，司机带上了一副茶镜。
Yóuyú guāngxiàn tài qiáng，sījī dàishàng le yífù chájìng。
The driver wore a pair of dark brown glasses because of the overly bright light.
茶枯可以用来杀死池塘里的野杂鱼类。
Chákū kěyǐ yònglái shāsǐ chítáng lǐ de yězá yúlèi。
Tea seed cake can be used to kill wild fish in the lake.
他们每天到楼下的小茶炉打开水。
Tāmen měitiān dào lóu xià de xiǎochálú dǎ kāishuǐ。
They go to the water shop downstairs every day to fetch hot water.
这个杯子里盛着茶卤。
Zhège bēizi lǐ chéng zhe chálǔ。
Threre is strong tea in the cup.
他的裤子是茶青色的。
Tā de kùzi shì cháqīngsè de。
His trousers are yellowish- bottle green.
今天是老人的茶寿，亲戚邻居纷纷登门拜贺。
Jīntiān shì lǎorén de cháshòu，qīnqi línjū fēnfēn dēngmén bàihè。
Relatives and neighbours are coming to congratulate the elderly man on his 108th birthday today.
在庙会上，我买了两碗茶汤。
Zài miàohuì shàng，wǒ mǎi le liǎng wǎn chátāng。
I bought two bowls of glutinous millet paste at the temple fair.
这次活动的主题是中日两国的茶文化交流。
Zhècì huódòng de zhǔtí shì Zhōng Rì liǎngguó de chá wénhuà jiāoliú。
The theme of this activity is the communication of tea culture between China and Japan.
我每天早上起来都喜欢吃两个茶叶蛋。
Wǒ měitiān zǎoshàng qǐlái dōu xǐhuan chī liǎnggè cháyèdàn。
I like eating two eggs after getting up in the morning.
这个特色商店主要经营茶叶食品。
Zhège tèsè shāngdiàn zhǔyào jīngyíng cháyè shípǐn。
This specialty shop mainly sells food with tea flavor.
他退休后，把很多精力放到了茶艺研究上。
Tā tuìxiū hòu，bǎ hěnduō jīnglì fàngdào le cháyì yánjiū shàng。
He devoted much energy to tea arts after retirement.
这种饮品应该属于茶制饮料。
Zhèzhǒng yǐnpǐn yīnggāi shǔyú cházhì yǐnliào。
This drink should be regarded as a kind of beverage with tea flavor.
这是本城最大的茶庄。
Zhè shì běn chéng zuìdàde cházhuāng。
This is the biggest tea shop in town.
一点茶资，请先生笑纳。
Yìdiǎn cházī,qǐng xiānshēng xiàonà.
Please accept my small changes for the tea.
他这两天的工作就是把茶籽饼撒在地里。
Tā zhè liǎngtiān de gōngzuò jiùshì bǎ cházǐbǐng sǎzàidì lǐ。
His work in recent days is to scatter the tea seed cakes in the field.
茶籽油也可以制成保健品。
Cházǐyóu yě kěyǐ zhìchéng bǎojiànpǐn。
Tea-seed oil can also be made into health care products.
我只想买这套茶具中的杯子，但是他们不拆零出售。
Wǒ zhǐxiǎng mǎi zhètào chájù zhōng de bēizi，dàn shì tāmen bùchāilíng chūshòu。
I only want to buy the cups in this tea set, but they don\'t sell it part by part.
这套茶具可以拆卖吗？
Zhètào chájù kěyǐ chāi mài ma？
Can I just buy parts of this tea set?
这些都是刚刚到货的炒青绿茶。
Zhèxiē dōushì gānggāng dàohuò de chǎoqīng lǜchá。
This is the pan-fried green tea that has just arrived.
冲泡不同的茶要用不同的方法。
Chōngpào bùtóng de chá yào yòng bùtóng de fāngfǎ。
Different types of tea are mixed in different ways.
人们爱喝春茶，是喜欢那新鲜的味道。
Rénmen ài hē chūnchá，shì xǐhuan nà xīnxiān de wèidào。
Spring tea has a fresh taste and that is why people love to drink it.
这眼泉水味道醇甜，用它沏茶肯定很不错。
Zhè yǎn quánshuǐ wèidào chúntián，yòng tā qīchá kěndìng hěnbúcuò。
This spring water is pure and sweet, so it is good for making tea.
这杯茶口感醇酽，一定是上等的陈年潽洱。
Zhèbēi chá kǒugǎn chúnyàn，yídìng shì shàngděng de chénnián pūěr。
This cup of tea tastes so pure and strong that it must be old first-class Pu\'er tea.
欢迎您来北京吃小吃，品大碗儿茶。
Huānyíng nín lái Běijīng chī xiǎochī，pǐn dàwǎnrchá。
Welcome to Beijing to enjoy local delicacies and stall tea served in large bowls.
他端茶倒水，热情待客。
Tā duānchá dàoshuǐ，rèqíng dàikè。
He served the guests hospitably.
他从铫子里倒出一杯茶，招待客人。
Tā cóng diàozi lǐ dàochū yì bēi chá，zhāodài kèrén。
He poured a cup of tea from the pot to serve to the guest.
她很喜欢花草茶的那份芳馨。
Tā hěn xǐhuan huācǎochá de nà fèn fāngxīn。
She likes the fragrance of flower tea.
用沸水泡上一杯红茶，他慢慢地品尝。
Yòng fèishuǐ pào shàng yì bēi hóngchá，tā mànmàn de pǐncháng。
He made a cup of black tea with boiling water and tasted it slowly.
用盖碗泡的茶味道就是好。
Yòng gàiwǎn pào de chá wèidào jiùshì hǎo。
Tea made in a covered tea bowl tastes good.
外国游客特别喜欢这里的功夫茶。
Wàiguó yóukè tèbié xǐhuan zhèlǐ de gōngfuchá。
Foreign tourists really like the Gongfu tea here.
六安瓜片是中国十大名茶之一，非常清香。
Liùānguāpiàn shì Zhōngguó shídà míngchá zhīyī，fēicháng qīngxiāng。
Liuan green tea is one of the ten famous teas of China and has a mild fragrant taste.
干杭菊沏茶能够清目去火。
Gān hángjú qīchá nénggòu qīngmù qùhuǒ。
Dry white chrysanthemum can improve eyesight and reduce internal heat.
这个蛋糕店还兼营奶茶，冰淇淋，生意很好。
Zhège dàngāodiàn hái jiānyíng nǎichá，bīngqílín，shēngyì hěnhǎo。
The cake shop has a sideline in selling milk tea and ice cream, which makes a good profit.
卷曲的茶叶遇到开水渐渐舒展开来，在杯子里上下浮沉。
Juǎnqū de cháyè yùdào kāishuǐ jiànjiàn shūzhǎn kāilái，zài bēizi lǐ shàngxià fúchén。
The crimped tea leaves gradually unfold after hitting the hot water and are floating up and down in the cup.
你真是个看财奴，连大碗茶都舍不得请我喝！
Nǐ zhēnshì gè kāncáinú，lián dàwǎnchá dōu shěbùdé qǐng wǒ hē！
You are such a miser, you won\'t even buy me Dawan Tea.
别呆着了，客人来了，快给客人看茶！
Bié dāizhe le，kèrén lái le，kuài gěi kèrén kànchá！
Don\'t stay still, there is a guest. Bring some tea quickly.
苦丁茶细细品来其实是先苦后甜的，很好喝！
Kǔdīngchá xìxì pǐnlái qíshí shì xiān kǔ hòu tián de，hěnhǎo hē！
Though colyx tea tastes bitter, it becomes sweet later and really tastes good.
我们在茶馆里闲坐聊天儿。
Wǒmen zài cháguǎn lǐ xiánzuò liáotiānr。
We sat in the tea shop, chatting.
皇帝把茶杯狠狠地砸在地上，龙颜大怒。
Huángdì bǎ chábēi hěnhěn de zázài dìshàng，lóngyán dànù。
The emperor flew into a rage and smashed the cup onto the floor.
这些毛茶要经过复杂的工序加工后才能出售。
Zhèxiē máochá yào jīngguò fùzá de gōngxù jiāgōng hòu cáinéng chūshòu。
These raw tea leaves can be sold only after complex processing.
这些毛条会被加工成绿茶然后出售。
Zhèxiē máotiáo huì bèi jiāgōngchéng lǜchá ránhòu chūshòu。
These raw tea leaves will be processed into green tea to sell.
我请你喝好茶吧，明前采摘的碧螺春！
Wǒ qǐng nǐ hē hǎochá ba，míngqián cǎizhāi de bìluóchūn！
I will treat you to have tea, which is biluochun tea picked before Pure Brightness.
蒙古族的奶食种类很多，有奶豆腐、奶茶、奶酒等。
Ménggǔzú de nǎishí zhǒng lèi hěnduō，yǒu nǎidòufu、nǎichá、nǎijiǔ děng。
There are many kinds of milk food in Mongolian ethnic group, such as cheese-shaped milk products, milk tea, and fermented milk.
品茶是她的兴趣所在。
Pǐnchá shì tā de xīngqù suǒzài。
She is interested in tea tasting.
绿茶的品类有很多，我最喜欢的是雨前龙井。
Lǜchá de pǐnlèi yǒu hěnduō，wǒ zuì xǐhuan de shì yǔqián lóngjǐng。
Of the many kinds of green tea, I like Yuqian longjing tea most.
长期喝普洱茶有减肥的功效。
Chángqī hē pǔ\'ěrchá yǒu jiǎnféi de gōngxiào。
If you keep drinking Pu\'er tea every day for a long time you will lose weight.
他烧了一壶开水，准备给客人沏茶。
Tā shāo le yì hú kāishuǐ，zhǔnbèi gěi kèrén qīchá。
He started boiling water in a kettle to make tea for the guests.
祁红是安徽祁门一带出产的名茶。
Qíhóng shì Ānhuī Qímén yídài chūchǎn de míngchá。
Keemun is a famous brand of tea produced in Qimen County, Anhui province.
他家客厅的茶几上有个气压水瓶。
Tā jiā kètīng de chájǐ shàng yǒu gè qìyā shuǐpíng。
There are several barometric pressure water bottles on the tea table in his drawing room.
我喜欢上了青茶的芳香。
Wǒ xǐhuan shàng le qīngchá de fāngxiāng。
I fell in love with the aroma of oolong tea.
别在那儿傻站着，还不快给客人请茶！
Bié zài nàr shǎzhàn zhe，hái bú kuài gěi kèrén qǐngchá！
Don’t just stand there like a fool, why don\'t you serve tea to the guests?
他舍不得用他那把最珍爱的砂壶沏茶待客。
Tā shěbu de yòng tā nà bǎ zuì zhēnài de shāhú qīchá dàikè。
He was reluctant to make tea with his most cherished pottery pot when receiving guests.
要说我喜欢的饮品，应该首推普洱茶。
Yào shuō wǒ xǐhuan de yǐnpǐn，yīnggāi shǒutuī pǔěrchá。
As to my favorite drink, I like pu\'er tea best.
约三两个好友在临湖的水阁上喝茶谈天儿，这样的聚会绝对优雅。
Yuē sān liǎnggè hǎoyǒu zài línhú de shuǐgé shàng hēchá tántiānr，zhèyàng de jùhuì juéduì yōuyǎ。
Drinking tea and chatting with some friends in a waterside pavilion is an really elegant kind of party.
当下茶叶市场上把普洱炒得火热，不知是不是昙花一现？
Dāngxià cháyè shìchǎng shàng bǎ pǔěr chǎo de huǒrè，bùzhī shìbushì tánhuā yíxiàn？
Currently, Pu\'er Tea is very popular, but maybe it\'s just a passing fad.
我不小心摔断了这个茶壶的提梁。
Wǒ bùxiǎoxīn shuāiduàn le zhège cháhú de tíliáng。
I broke the handle of that tea pot by my carelessness.
我每天下午都要去这个茶馆听书。
Wǒ měitiān xiàwǔ dōuyào qù zhège cháguǎn tīngshū。
Every afternoon, I go to the teahouse to listen to storytelling.
小张每周都会和男朋友来茶社品尝香茗。
Xiǎo Zhāng měizhōu dōuhuì hé nánpéngyou lái cháshè pǐncháng xiāngmíng。
Xiao Zhang goes to the tea house to drink tea with her boyfriend every week.
妈妈刚从超市买回一只小巧精致的茶壶。
Māma gāng cóng chāoshì mǎihuí yìzhī xiǎoqiǎo jīngzhì de cháhú。
Mother just bought an exquisite teapot from the supermarket.
爸爸买了今年新出的小叶，泡出的茶可香了。
Bàba mǎi le jīnnián xīnchū de xiǎoyè，pàochū de chá kě xiāng le。

Tā zànyáng tā de tóngshí yě pīpíngle tā。

Tā zài xìn zhōng rèqíng de zànyángle tā。

Zhème chàjìn de jiémù yě yǒurén kuāzàn，zhēnshì pěngchòujiǎo！
They even praise such a disappointing program, they really  are sycophants.
他的善行得到了附近居民的赞赏。
Tā de shànxíng dédào le fùjìn jūmín de zànshǎng。
His kind deeds were praised by neighboring citizens.
这首颂诗充分体现出了作者对母爱的赞颂之意。
Zhèshǒu sòngshī chōngfèn tǐxiàn chū le zuòzhě duì mǔài de zànsòng zhī yì。
This eulogy poem well displays the author\'s praise for maternal love.
唱起这些颂赞伟大祖国的歌曲，使人心情振奋。
Chàngqǐ zhèxiē sòngzàn wěidà zǔguó de gēqǔ，shǐ rén xīnqíng zhènfèn。
Singing these songs that praise our great country, one feels stimulated.
这篇颂赞是作者的真情流露，所以言真意切，读来令人感动。
Zhèpiān sòngzàn shì zuòzhě de zhēnqíng liúlù，suǒyǐ yánzhēn yìqiè，dú lái lìngrén gǎndòng。
This eulogy was written from the author\'s real feelings, so it is genuine and moving.
小张听到几句赞美他的话就晕乎了，忘乎所以。
Xiǎo Zhāng tīngdào jǐ jù zànměi tā de huà jiù yūnhū le，wànghū suǒyǐ。
After hearing the praise, Xiaozhang felt dizzy and lost his head in a moment of excitement.
由于母亲悲痛过度，她代替母亲主持赞礼。
Yóuyú mǔqīn bēitòng guòdù，tā dàitì mǔqīn zhǔchí zànlǐ。
As mother is extremely grieved, she took mother\'s role and hosted the ceremony.
赞礼宣布结婚仪式正式开始。
Zànlǐ xuānbùjiéhūn yíshì zhèngshì kāishǐ。
The master of the ceremony announced that the wedding ceremony officially began.
他做得很对，我赞佩他的这种勇气。
Tā zuò de hěn duì，wǒ zànpèi tā de zhèzhǒng yǒngqì。
He did the right thing, and I appreciate his courage.
他们是中间派人士，既不赞成，也不反对。
Tāmen shì zhōng jiānpài rénshì，jì bú zànchéng，yě bùfǎnduì。
They belong to the neutral section, neither in supporting of it nor against it.
她喜欢被众星捧月般地夸赞。
Tā xǐhuan bèi zhòngxīng pěngyuè bān de kuāzàn。
She likes to be praised by a crowd of people.
在业务上这股钻劲儿让他得到了许多领导的赞赏。

His spurt of effort for the business has gained him a lot of praise from many leaders.

Shèngdànjié de wǎnshàng，jiàotúmen zài jiàotáng yínchàng zànměishī。

jǔshǒu biǎoshì zànchéng
raise one\'s hand to express approval

大家对他莫不啧啧称赞。

qǔ zànchéng lìchǎng

shèngzàn

Wǒ bú zàntóng。

经验丰富
jīngyàn fēngfù
have rich experience; be very experienced

fēngfù zìjǐ de shēnghuó jīngyàn
enrich one\'s experience of life

There are many people in China, and accordingly their conventions and rituals are abundant. Thus studying  them is very interesting.
丰收年的时候，我看见农村里大大小小有好多粮囤。
Fēngshōunián de shíhou，wǒ kànjiàn nóngcūn lǐ dàdàxiǎoxiǎo yǒu hǎo duō liángtún。
In harvest years, I saw many grain barns of different sizes in the country.
多年的狩猎生活使他成为了一位经验丰富的猎手。
Duōnián de shǒuliè shēnghuó shǐ tā chéngwéi le yíwèi jīngyàn fēngfù de lièshǒu。
Years of hunting made him an experienced hunter.
今年的裸大麦收成很好，又是一个丰收年。
Jīnnián de luǒdàmài shōuchéng hěnhǎo，yòushì yígè fēngshōunián。
Highland barley has had another good harvest this year.
今年又是一个丰收年，粮食满仓。
Jīnnián yòushì yígè fēngshōunián，liángshí mǎncāng。
This is another bumper harvest year, the storehouse is full of grain.
为了丰富居民的文化生活，小区里的民校新开设了舞蹈班。
Wèile fēngfù jūmín de wénhuà shēnghuó，xiǎoqū lǐ de mínxiào xīn kāishè le wǔdǎobān。
In order to enrich the cultural life of the citizens, a dance class was opened in the spare-time school for adults this quarter.
南瓜子营养丰富，据说有降血压、治疗慢性病等很多用处。
Nánguāzǐ yíngyǎng fēngfù，jùshuō yǒu jiàngxuèyā、zhìliáo mànxìngbìng děng hěnduō yòngchu。
Pumpkin seeds are nutritious. It is said that it can be used to reduce blood pressure, and cure chronic diseases.
村里的果园大丰收，大家临时聘请了许多农业工人，帮助采摘。
Cūn lǐ de guǒyuán dàfēngshōu，dàjiā línshí pìnqǐng le xǔduō nóngyè gōngrén，bāngzhù cǎizhāi。
The orchard in the village gives a copious harvest, and people hire many temporary farm workers to help.
他年轻的时候四海飘游，经历丰富。
Tā niánqīng de shíhou sìhǎi piāoyóu，jīnglì fēngfù。
He led a wandering life in his youth and had abundant experiences.
他自以为有丰富的社会经验、深谙世故。
Tā zìyǐwéi yǒu fēngfù de shèhuì jīngyàn、shēnānshìgù。
He claims himself rich in social experience and familiar with the ways of the world.
我公司为用户准备了丰富多样的声讯服务。
Wǒ gōngsī wèi yònghù zhǔnbèi le fēngfù duōyàng de shēngxùn fúwù。
Our company has prepared many and various telephone services for users.
由于防病措施到位，今年晚造作物获得大丰收。
Yóuyú fángbìng cuòshī dàowèi，jīnnián wǎnzào zuòwù huòdé dàfēngshōu。
Having done well in preventing diseases, we had a successful harvest of late-grown crops.
文史馆的资料很丰富，每周我都会去一次。
Wénshǐguǎn de zīliào hěn fēngfù，měi zhōu wǒ dōuhuì qù yícì。
The historical reference library has many books, and I go there once a week.
今年又是五谷丰登，奶奶脸上笑开了花。
Jīnnián yòushì wǔgǔfēngdēng，nǎinai liǎnshàng xiào kāi le huā。
This year we had a bumper grain harvest, which made my grandmother very happy.
这座小镇物阜民丰，是个适合养老的地方。
Zhèzuò xiǎozhèn wùfù mínfēng，shì gè shìhé yǎnglǎo de dìfāng。
This town is rich in resources and people there live a comfortable life, therefore it is a nice place to live when you are old.
这位作家的想象力可真丰富呀！
Zhèwèi zuòjiā de xiǎng xiàng lì kě zhēn fēngfù ya！
This writer has a great imagination.
今年烟农大获丰收，生活得到很大到改善。
Jīnnián yānnóng dàhuò fēngshōu，shēnghuó dédào hěndà dào gǎishàn。
The tobacco growers had a good harvest this year, and their living conditions are improved by a large margin.
我们这个地方蕴藏着十分丰富的银矿资源。
Wǒmen zhège dìfāng yùncáng zhe shífēn fēngfù de yínkuàng zīyuán。
Our district is rich in silver mines.
植物必须应季栽种，否则肯定无法获得丰收。
Zhíwù bìxū yīngjì zāizhòng，fǒuzé kěndìng wúfǎ huòdé fēngshōu。
We should plant in accordance with the season, or else we can\'t have a good harvest.
地下蕴含着丰富的铁矿。
Dìxià yùnhán zhe fēngfù de tiěkuàng。
There are rich iron mines underground.
他总是看杂书，所以知识丰富。
Tā zǒngshì kàn záshū，suǒyǐ zhīshi fēngfù。
He has read lots of books on various topics so that he has a wide range of knowledge.
生活中自己需要去找窍门才会过得丰富多彩。
Shēnghuó zhōng zìjǐ xūyào qù zhǎo qiàomén cái huì guò de fēngfù duōcǎi。
One needs to find their own skills to make life more colourful.
从他知人论世的言论中，可以看出他的阅历很丰富。
Cóng tā zhīrén lùnshì de yánlùn zhōng，kěyǐ kànchū tā de yuèlì hěn fēngfù。
We can sense his rich experience from his comments on people, and the world.
以前，自耕农的生活也不是我们想象的那么丰裕。
Yǐqián，zì gēng nóng de shēnghuó yě búshì wǒmen xiǎng xiàng de nàme fēngyù。
In the past, the lives of peasant landlords was not as prosperous as we assumed.
他经营的自留山上的果树，每年都获得大丰收。
Tā jīngyíng de zì liú shānshàng de guǒshù，měinián dōu huòdé dàfēngshōu。
He operates an orchard on his private hill and has a good harvest every year.
这次走台模特得到了丰厚的回报。
Zhècì zǒutái mótè dédào le fēnghòu de huíbào。
This time, the models performing onstage have gained a generous reward.
由于祖业丰厚，他这辈子可以衣食无忧了。
Yóuyú zǔyè fēnghòu，tā zhèbèizi kěyǐ yīshí wúyōu le。
Thanks to the generous ancestral estate, he has enough food and clothes for his entire life.
中国的地表水资源并不丰富。
Zhōngguó de dìbiǎo shuǐ zīyuán bìng bùfēngfù。
China is not rich in surface water.
现在市面上的冷冻食品特别丰富，给千家万户带来方便。
Xiànzài shìmiàn shàng de lěngdòng shípǐn tèbié fēngfù，gěi qiānjiā wànhù dàilái fāngbiàn。
Now in market, frozen food is very abundant which brings convenience to thousands of families.
他年龄尚小，羽毛未丰，看起来就是一副很稚气的样子。
Tā niánlíng shàngxiǎo，yǔmáo wèifēng，kànqǐlái jiùshì yífù hěn zhìqì de yàngzi。
He is still quite young and not mature enough. Judging from his appearance, people think he is quite childish.
有了丰富的教学经验，她教起书来得心应手。

With her wealth of teaching experience, she is a very proficient teacher.
丰富的知识是点点滴滴积累成的。

In-depth knowledge is accumulated bit by bit.

primary (secondary) coil

布设圈套
bùshè quāntào 
set (or lay) a trap
设下圈套
shèxià quāntào
set a trap for sb.
中圈套
zhòng quāntào
play into sb.\'s hands
他的诺言是个圈套，我可不上这个当。
Tā de nuòyán shì gè quāntào，wǒ kě bú shàng zhège dàng。
His promises are a trap and I won\'t be taken in.
引入圈套
yǐnrù quāntào 
lure into a trap; ensnare
她坠入了别人为她设计的圈套。
Tā zhuìrù le biérén wèi tā shèjì de quāntào。
She has fallen into a trap set by others.
落入圈套
luòrù quāntào
fall into a trap
我玩儿套圈儿游戏时赢得了这个小兔子玩具。
Wǒ wánr tàoquānr yóuxì shí yíngdé le zhège xiǎotùzi wánjù。

a put-up job

to lay a trap for sb
为某人设置圈套

You have fallen right into my trap.
你中了我的圈套。

他们完全进入了我们的圈套。

He fell right into the trap.
